anya-e0401n8:1_0: 170. Kammaṭṭhānasaṅgahe. Vidito viññāto nāmarūpa vibhāgo yenāti viggaho. Yogī puggalo.
anya-e0401n8:1_1: “Kilese sametī”ti kāmacchandādike nīvaraṇakilese upasameti. “Tathā pavatto”ti bhāvanāvasena
anya-e0401n8:1_2: pavatto. Vūpasamanavasena vā pavatto. “Tāyā”ti tāyabhāvanā paññāya, passantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n8:1_3: “Passitaṁ”ti samanupassitaṁ. Kathaṁ kasiṇabhāvanādikaṁ yogakammaṁ attāva attano ṭhānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:1_5: etena tiṭṭhati anivattamānaṁ pavattati etenāti ṭhānanti atthena padaṭṭhānameva ṭhānanti
anya-e0401n8:1_7: mukhyato vā upacārato vā dvidhāpi atthaṁ dassetuṁ “dasakasiṇānī”tiādi vuttaṁ. “Sesānipī”ti
anya-e0401n8:1_8: appamaññādīni sesakammaṭṭhānānipi. Yaṁ yaṁ anurūpaṁ yathānurūpaṁ. “Samudācaraṇaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:1_9: punappunaṁ bhusaṁ pavattanaṁ. “Saṁsagga bhedo”ti ekamekassa puggalassa kassaci dvecariyā,
anya-e0401n8:1_10: kassaci tissotiādinā sammissa vibhāgo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ”ti visuddhimagga aṭṭhakathāyaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:1_11: “Sabbāyapi appanāyā”ti jhānappanāya ca maggappanāya ca phalappanāya ca. “Yā āsanne
anya-e0401n8:1_12: pavattā dūre pavattāti adhikāro. “Itarā panā”ti dūre pavattāpana. “Tāsaṁ panā”ti
anya-e0401n8:1_13: tissannaṁ bhāvanānaṁ pana. “Tesaṁ pī”ti dvinnaṁ nimittānaṁpi. “Vidatthicaturaṅgulaṁ”
anya-e0401n8:1_14: nāma vitthārato caturaṅgulādhikaṁ vidatthippamāṇaṁ. Vidatthippamāṇaṁ vā caturaṅgulappamāṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:1_15: vātipi yujjati. Tathāhi visuddhimagge vāyokasiṇa vidhāne caturaṅgulappamāṇaṁ sīsaṁ
anya-e0401n8:1_16: vātena pahariyamānaṁ disvāti vuttaṁ. Khalamaṇḍalaṁ nāma kassakānaṁ kassamaddanabhūmibhāgamaṇḍalaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:1_17: “Kataṁ vā”ti nīlādivaṇṇavisesarahitaṁ aruṇavaṇṇaṁ mattikakkhaṇḍaṁ udakena madditvā
anya-e0401n8:1_18: cakkamaṇḍalaṁ viya parimaṇḍalaṁ sumaṭṭhatalaṁ pathavimaṇḍalaṁ karonti. Evaṁ kataṁ
anya-e0401n8:1_19: vā. “Akataṁ vā”ti katthaci bhūmibhāge kenaci akataṁ sayaṁ jātaṁ vā. “Kasiṇena jambudīpassā”ti ettha.
anya-e0401n8:2: Buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
anya-e0401n8:4_0: Gāthāseso. Tattha jambudīpassa kasiṇato sāpītivarā evāti yojanā. “Kasiṇato”ti ca
anya-e0401n8:4_1: sakalamaṇḍalato. Sakalassa jambudīpamaṇḍalassa issariyādhipatito pīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:4_3: nimittapaññatti eva vuccati. “Phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne”ti kāyevā rukkhaggādīsuvā vātena pahataṭṭhāne.
anya-e0401n8:4_4: “Vāyu vaṭṭī”ti vātaparimaṇḍalaṁ. Candasūriyānaṁ aggissa ca obhāsena visiṭṭhāti samāso.
anya-e0401n8:5_0: “Dhūmātaṁ”ti dhūmāyitaṁ. Dhūmapūritapaṭaṁ viyāti vuttaṁ hoti. Tenāha “sūnabhāvaṁ
anya-e0401n8:5_1: gataṁ”ti. Ante kakāro nindatthajotakoti vuttaṁ “kucchitattā”ti. Jegucchi tabbattāti
anya-e0401n8:5_3: vicchinnakaṁ nāmāti sambandho. Tattha visesena nīlantivinīlaṁ. Tameva kucchitattā
anya-e0401n8:5_4: vinīlakaṁ. “Tadeva puna paccitvā”ti vinīlakasarīrameva puna kālātikkame paccitvā.
anya-e0401n8:5_5: Pūtilohitānaṁ paripakkabhāvaṁ patvāti attho. Tato tato dvāracchiddato. Yuttaṁ tadeva
anya-e0401n8:5_6: sarīranti sambandho. Vicchinnakaṁ nāma, vicchiddakantipi paṭhanti. “Apakaḍḍhitvā”ti
anya-e0401n8:5_7: khaṇḍāni sarīrato mocetvā taṁ taṁ padesaṁ kaḍḍhitvā. “Paggharitalohita sarīraṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:6_0: “Buddhānussatī”ti ettha buddhasaddo guṇyūpacāra vacanaṁ hoti. Guṇino dabbassa nāmena
anya-e0401n8:6_1: guṇānaṁ gahetabbattāti vuttaṁ “buddhaguṇassa anussati buddhānussatī”ti. Esanayo dhammānussatādīsu.
anya-e0401n8:6_2: “Arahatādī”ti arahatādiguṇo. Vigatāni dussilyādi malāni ca maccherañca yassa taṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_3: vigatamalamaccheraṁ. Tassa bhāvoti viggaho. “Attanā adhigatanibbānañcā”ti etena ariyapuggalānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_4: kilesānaṁ accantavūpasamo vutto. “Yaṁ ārabbhā”ti yaṁ puggalaṁ ārabbha. Hitūpasaṁhāro
anya-e0401n8:6_5: nāma ayaṁ puggalo avero hotu, abyāpajjo hotūtiādinā averatādīni hitasukhāni tasmiṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_6: puggale cittena upasaṁharaṇaṁ. Karuṇā, muditā, heṭṭhā cetasikasaṅgahe vuttatthā eva.
anya-e0401n8:6_7: Hitūpasaṁhāro ca hitamodanā ca ahitāpanayanañcāti dvando. Tattha hitūpasaṁhāro mettāya
anya-e0401n8:6_8: kiccaṁ. Hitamodanā muditāya. Ahitāpanayanaṁ karuṇāya kiccaṁ. Tattha paraṁ hitasukhasampannaṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_9: disvā tena parahitena attani pītipāmojjavaḍḍhanaṁ hitamodanā nāma. Paraṁ dukkhitaṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_10: disvā ayaṁ imamhādukkhā muccatu, mākilamatūti evaṁ cittena parasmiṁ ahitassa dukkhassa
anya-e0401n8:6_11: apanayanaṁ ahitāpanayanaṁ nāma. “Tesaṁ”ti parasattānaṁ. Sassa attano idanti sakaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_12: “Idaṁ” sukhadukkhakāraṇaṁ. Attanā katakammaṁ eva sakaṁ yesaṁ te kammassakā. Parasattā
anya-e0401n8:6_13: eva. Tesaṁ bhāvo. Tassa anubrūhananti viggaho. “Sīmasambhedo”ti attā ca piyapuggalo
anya-e0401n8:6_14: ca majjhattapuggalo ca veripuggalo cāti catasso sīmā. Sambhindanaṁ sambhedo. Sammissanaṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_15: anānattakaraṇanti attho. Sīmānaṁ sambhedo sīmasambhedo. Sabbā itthiyo, sabbepurisātiādinā
anya-e0401n8:6_16: odhiso paricchedato pharaṇaṁ odhisopharaṇaṁ nāma. Sabbesattā, sabbepāṇā, sabbebhūtātiādinā
anya-e0401n8:6_17: anodhiso aparicchedato pharaṇaṁ anodhisopharaṇaṁ nāma. Puratthimāyadisāya sabbesattā
anya-e0401n8:6_18: averāhontūtiādinā disāvibhāgavasena pharaṇaṁ disāpharaṇaṁ nāma. “Taṁ samaṅgīno cā”ti
anya-e0401n8:6_19: tāhi appamaññāhi samaṅgīno puggalā. “Niccaṁ sommahadayabhāvenā”ti sabbakālaṁ santasītala
anya-e0401n8:6_20: hadayabhāvena. Brahmasaddo vā seṭṭhapariyāyo ‘brahmaṁ puññaṁ pasavatī’tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0401n8:6_21: Asitabbaṁ bhuñjitabbanti asitaṁ. Pañcabhojanaṁ. Pātabbanti pītaṁ. Aṭṭhavidhaṁ pānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_22: Dantena khāyitabbaṁ khāditabbanti khāyitaṁ. Pūvakkhajjaphalakkhajjādikaṁ nānākhādanīyaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_23: Aṅgulīhipi gahetvā sāyitabbaṁ lehitabbanti sāyitaṁ. Madhupphāṇitādikaṁ sāyanīyaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_24: Sarasappaṭikūlatā nāma attano sabhāvato paṭikūlatā. Catubbidhopi hi āhāro bhājanesu
anya-e0401n8:6_25: vā hatthamukhādīsu vā yattha yattha sammakkheti, laggati, limpati. Taṁ udakena dhovitabbaṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_26: hoti. Adhotaṁ pana tampi jegucchanīyaṁ hoti. Āsayato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa ajjhoharīyamānassa
anya-e0401n8:6_27: kaṇṭhādīsu ṭhitehi pittasemhādīhi āsayehi sammissanavasena paṭikūlatā. Nidhānato
anya-e0401n8:6_28: paṭikūlatā nāma nidhānato paṭikūlatā. “Nidhānaṁ”ti ca āmāsayo vuccati. Pakkato paṭikūlatā
anya-e0401n8:6_29: nāma tassa nidhānagatassa paripakkakāle gūthamuttādibhāvapattito paṭikūlatā. Apakkato
anya-e0401n8:6_30: paṭikūlatā nāma tasmiṁ aparipakke ajiṇṇe sati sarīre nānāroguppattivasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_31: Phalato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa paripakkakālato paṭṭhāya sarīre kesalomādīnaṁ paṭikūlarāsīnaṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_32: vaḍḍhanavasena paṭikūlatā. Nissandato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa na vahidvārehi vā lomakūpehivā
anya-e0401n8:6_33: aññehi nānāvaṇamukhehi vā uggharaṇa paggharaṇādivasena paṭikūlatā. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_35: putta maṁsakhādane viya ati manuññepi āhāre rasataṇhā pahānavasena pavattā saññā.
anya-e0401n8:6_37: karaṇatthe, itthambhūtalakkhaṇevā karaṇa vacanaṁ. Tattha karaṇatthetāva “rāgena caratī”ti
anya-e0401n8:6_38: catūsu iriyāpathesu yebhūyyena rāgacittena carati. Rāgacittena niyyamāno vicaratīti
anya-e0401n8:6_39: vuttaṁ hoti. Itthambhūta lakkhaṇe pana “rāgena caratī”ti tesu rāgaketu rāgadhajo
anya-e0401n8:6_40: hutvā vicaratīti vuttaṁ hoti. “Assā”ti tassapuggalassa. “Ussanno”ti uggato pākaṭataro.
anya-e0401n8:6_41: Bahutarotipi vadanti. “Pahānāyā”ti ettha itisaddo ādi attho. Tena karuṇā bhāvetabbā
anya-e0401n8:6_42: vihiṁsāya pahānāya. Muditā bhāvetabbā aratiyā pahānāyāti imaṁ pāḷisesaṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:6_43: “Nissaraṇatāvacanato”ti nissaraṇañhetaṁ byāpādassa yadidaṁ mettāceto vimutti. Nissaraṇañhetaṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_44: vihesāyayadidaṁ karuṇā cetovimutti. Nissaraṇañhetaṁ aratiyā yadidaṁ muditā ceto vimuttīti
anya-e0401n8:6_45: evaṁ nissaraṇa bhāvavacanato ca. Catasso appamaññāyo. La. Dosa caritassāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_46: “Dosa vatthuttābhāvato cā”ti dosuppattiyā vatthu bhāvassakaraṇa bhāvassa abhāvato
anya-e0401n8:6_47: ca. Nīlādīni cattāri kasiṇāni dosa caritassāti vuttaṁ. Kasmāpanettha dosa caritassa
anya-e0401n8:6_48: upekkhā sappāyakāraṇaṁ visuṁ na vuttanti. Aññakāraṇattā na vuttanti dassento “ettha
anya-e0401n8:6_50: ca hotīti adhikāro. “Tassā”ti pamāda bahulassa vikkhittacittassa ca puggalassa. Vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n8:6_51: siyā. Visuddhi magge pana evaṁ vuttaṁ natthīti adhippāyo. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Buddhivisaya
anya-e0401n8:6_52: bhāvenā”ti vuttaṁ. Yadi buddhivisayattā mohacaritassa sappāyaṁ. Buddhivisayabhūtāni
anya-e0401n8:6_53: maraṇa upasamasaññā vavatthānānipi mohacaritassa sappāyāni siyunti vuttaṁ “evañhisatī”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_55: kammaṭṭhānesupi. Evaṁsati vaṇṇakasiṇānaṁ puthulakhuddakatāpi ettha saṅgahitā hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:6_56: “Mahantaṁ”ti vidatthi caturaṅgulato mahantaṁ. Yadi evasaddo yathārutameva yujjeyya.
anya-e0401n8:6_57: Evaṁsati khuddakaṁ vitakkacaritasseva sappāyaṁ, na buddhicaritādīnanti evamatthopi
anya-e0401n8:6_58: gaṇheyya. Atha buddhicaritassa pana asappāyaṁ nāma natthīti aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjheyyāti
anya-e0401n8:6_59: iminā adhippāyena “khuddakanti padeyujjatī”ti vuttaṁ. Athavā, puthulaṁ mohacaritassa,
anya-e0401n8:6_60: khuddakaṁ vitakkacaritasseva, namohacaritassāti atthe sati, buddhicaritādīnaṁ pana
anya-e0401n8:6_61: puthulaṁpi khuddakaṁpi anuññātaṁ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Sabbañcetaṁ”ti sabbañca etaṁcaritavibhāgavacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_62: Ujuvipaccanīkavasena tīsu akusala caritesu puggalesu. Vitakka carite ca atisappāyatāya
anya-e0401n8:6_63: saddhābuddhi caritesūti adhippāyo. Tenāha “rāgādīnaṁ pana avikkhambhikā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_0: “Buddhadhamma. La. Guṇānaṁ”ti ettha guṇasaddo pubbapadesu yojetabbo buddhaguṇānañca
anya-e0401n8:7_1: dhammaguṇānañcātiādinā. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṁ guṇapade. Na tappetīti atappanīyo. Tappanaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_2: santuṭṭhiṁ na janetīti attho. Saṁvejanaṁ saṁvegaṁ janetīti saṁvejaniyo. “Dhammo”ti
anya-e0401n8:7_3: sabhāvo. Saṁvejaniyo dhammo yassāti saṁvejaniya dhammaṁ. Maraṇaṁ. “Pañcamajjhānasamādhissā”ti
anya-e0401n8:7_6: kassāti vuttaṁ hoti. Tenāha “gūtharāsi dassane viyā”ti. Na te kadāci somanassena
anya-e0401n8:7_7: vinā appanaṁ pāpuṇanti. Byāpādavihiṁsā aratīnaṁ dūribhāvena somanassuppattiyā atisukarattā
anya-e0401n8:7_9: “Daḷhaṁ”ti bhusaṁ. “Vibhūtaṁ”ti pākaṭaṁ. Nimittaṁ daḷhavibhūtaṁ katvā gahaṇaṁ daḷha
anya-e0401n8:7_11: ettha paṭibhāgasaddo tassa dise pavattoti āha “tādise”tiādiṁ. “Taṁsaṇṭhāne”ti etena
anya-e0401n8:7_12: pathavimaṇḍalādīsu viya saṇṭhānākārena ṭhitesu sabhāva dhamma puñjesu eva tassadisaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_13: paṭibhāganimittaṁ nāma sijjhatīti dasseti. “Eva”nti samathasaṅgahe tāva dasakasiṇāni,
anya-e0401n8:7_15: bhikkhunā ācariyassa santike sabbassa kammaṭṭhāna vidhānassa uggahaṇaṁ uggaho. Tasmiṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_16: kosallaṁ uggahakosallaṁ. Apicettha. Sabbaṁ uggahituṁ asakkontena yaṁ attanā ārabhissati.
anya-e0401n8:7_17: Tassa ekassa vidhānaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ uggahetabbaṁ. “Uggaṇhantassā”ti ettha ukāro upari
anya-e0401n8:7_18: attho. “Gahaṇaṁ”ti ca yathā citte avinassamānaṁ hutvā labbhati, tathā katvā cittena
anya-e0401n8:7_20: cakkhunā dassanasadisaṁ karontassa. Parito samantato karaṇaṁ parikammaṁ. Tasmiṁ nimittaggahaṇakamme
anya-e0401n8:7_21: yaṁ yaṁ kattabbavidhānaṁ atthi, taṁ taṁ paripuṇṇaṁ katvā gahaṇanti vuttaṁ hoti. Bhāvanāti
anya-e0401n8:7_23: rattidivaṁ nirantaraṁ ārabhantassa. Uggaha nimitte saṇṭhānaṁ gaṇhantopi vaṇṇarūpādinā
anya-e0401n8:7_24: sabhāva dhammena saheva gaṇhāti. Paṭibhāganimitte pana sabhāvadhammaṁ muñcitvā tassa
anya-e0401n8:7_25: disaṁ nimitta paññatti saṅkhātaṁ suddhasaṇṭhānameva gaṇhāti. Ettha siyā, paṭibhāganimittepi
anya-e0401n8:7_26: vaṇṇo nāma sandissati yevāti. Saccaṁ. So pana paṭibhāgamattaṁ hoti. Na ekantavaṇṇo.
anya-e0401n8:7_28: bhāvanācittassa abbhantare pakkhittaṁ viya hotīti adhippāyo. Obhāsatīti obhāso. Obhāso
anya-e0401n8:7_29: hutvā jātanti obhāsajātaṁ. Obhāsanaṁ vā obhāso. Jāto obhāso assāti obhāsajātaṁ. “Pātentī”ti
anya-e0401n8:7_30: paṭipātenti. Puna uppajjanavasena uṭṭhātuṁ na denti. “Etāyā”ti kattu atthe karaṇavacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_32: palibodha dhammehi rakkhaṇatthaṁ. Katame pana tesattavidhā palibodhadhammā nāmāti.
anya-e0401n8:7_33: Idha amhehi vattabbaṁ natthi. Visuddhi magge eva te vuttāti dassetuṁ gāthamāha. “Āvāso”ti
anya-e0401n8:7_36: sevanavasena paṭipajjantassa. “Kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṁ atikkamitvā”ti etena kāmabhūmi
anya-e0401n8:7_37: kāmabhavasamatikkamo, rūpabhūmirūpabhava okkamo ca vutto. Vasanaṁ vasī. Satti. Sāmatthiyanti
anya-e0401n8:7_38: attho. Vasiṁ bhūtaṁ pattanti vasibhūtaṁ. Vasī eva vasitā. Yathā pāramitāti. “Tato
anya-e0401n8:7_39: vicāranti” ettha itisaddo ādiattho. Tena tato pītiṁtiādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti. Icchantānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_41: “Dandhāyitattaṁ”ti dandhaṁ hutvā ayati pavattatīti dandhāyitaṁ. Tassa bhāvo dandhāyitattaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_43: kriyāvisesanapadāni. “Yatthicchakaṁ”ti yattha yattha ṭhāne icchānu rūpaṁ. Yadicchakantiyasmiṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_44: yasmiṁ khaṇe icchānu rūpaṁ. “Yāvaticchakaṁ”ti yattakena pamāṇena icchānu rūpaṁ. “Vitakkādikaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_45: oḷārikaṅgaṁ pahānāyā”ti ettha kassa balena pahānaṁ hoti. Taṁ taṁ virāga bhāvanā balena
anya-e0401n8:7_46: pahānaṁ hoti. Kāca taṁ taṁ virāgabhāvanā nāma hoti. Ajjhāsaya visesa pariggahitā
anya-e0401n8:7_47: upacārabhāvanā evāti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “pathamajjhānaṁ tāvā”tiādi vuttaṁ. “Ātāpavīriyaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:7_48: yenavīriyena yogino attānaṁ vā kilesa dhamme vā ātāpenti paritāpenti. Taṁ ātāpavīriyaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_49: nāma. Ugghāṭīyamānampi ākāsameva hoti. Taṁ ārabbha uparijhānantaruppattiyā bhāvanaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_50: karontassapi punappunaṁ tameva pañcamajjhānaṁ uppajjati. Ārammaṇe ca anatikkante
anya-e0401n8:7_53: thometvā. Sammā anussaraṇaṁ samanussaraṇaṁ. “Itaresaṁpi vā”ti puthujjana paṇḍitānaṁpi
anya-e0401n8:7_54: vā. Maraṇa saññā vavatthānesu parikammañca samādhiyati, upacāro ca sampajjatīti yojanā
anya-e0401n8:7_55: tikkhapaññānaṁ pana puthujjanānaṁpi sataṁ buddhaguṇādīsupi upacāra sambhavo aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_56: vuttoyeva. “Samathajjhānesū”ti idaṁ adhikāravasena vuttaṁ. Vipassanā kammaṁpi gahetabbamevāti
anya-e0401n8:7_57: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Pubbedānaṁ datvā iminā puññena āyatiṁ jhānābhiññāyo vā maggaphalāni vā
anya-e0401n8:7_58: paṭilabhissāmīti patthanaṁ katvā āgatopi katādhikāro evātipi vadanti. Katamo pana
anya-e0401n8:7_59: katādhikāro nāmāti āha “āsannabhave”tiādiṁ. Aṭṭhavidhesu catukkanayavasena, navavidhesu
anya-e0401n8:7_60: pañcakanayavasena vuttoti tesaṁ vādīnaṁ sādhakavacanaṁ. Vicāretvā pana gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_61: Ākāsa kasiṇena vinā arūpajjhānāni labhitvā puna abhiññatthāya parikammekate ākāsakasiṇepi
anya-e0401n8:7_62: kattabbattā tassa abhiññāpādakatā sambhavo vuttoti atthassa sambhavato. Pubbe abhāvita
anya-e0401n8:7_63: bhāvanoti ca akatādhikāroti ca atthato ekaṁ. “Ādikammiko”ti abhiññākamme ādikammiko.
anya-e0401n8:7_64: “Tādisānaṁ”ti pubbe akatādhikārānaṁ abhāvitabhāvanānaṁ idāni iddhivikubbanaṁ karissāmīti
anya-e0401n8:7_66: ca upalakkhaṇavacanaṁ. Dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ savanaṁ karissāmītiādikaṁpi gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_67: Idañca ādikammikavidhānādhikārattā vuttaṁ. Abhiññāsu vasipattānampi taṁ pañcamajjhānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_69: sataṁ hotu sahassaṁ hotūtiādinā cittena abhividhātabbaṁ. Abhinīharitabbanti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_70: hoti. “Sataṁ homi, sahassaṁ homīti vā”ti attānaṁ sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā nimminanavasena
anya-e0401n8:7_71: vuttaṁ. Sesaṁ pana aññathānimminanavasena. Sotuṁ vā saddaṁ, passituṁ vā rūpaṁ, jānituṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_72: vā paracittaṁ. Anussarituṁ vā pubbenivutthaṁ. Aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe. “Adhiṭṭhātī”ti abhiññāya
anya-e0401n8:7_73: adhiṭṭhāti. Abhividhāti nibbattetīti vuttaṁ hoti. Duvidhaṁhi adhiṭṭhānaṁ parikammena
anya-e0401n8:7_74: adhiṭṭhānaṁ abhiññāya adhiṭṭhānanti. Idha pana abhiññāya adhiṭṭhānaṁ vuttaṁ. “Adhiṭṭhāna
anya-e0401n8:7_75: cittenā”ti abhiññācittenāti vuttaṁ hoti. “Parikammacittassā”ti pubbabhāge āvajjana
anya-e0401n8:7_76: parikamma adhiṭṭhānaparikammacittassa. Pacchimaṁ pana pādakajjhāna samāpajjanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_77: Parikammacittassa samādhānatthāyāti vuttaṁ. Parikammacitte samāhite kiṁ payojananti
anya-e0401n8:7_79: samādhiññāṇasotena āsanne dibbavisayaṁpi saddaṁ suṇātītiādinā vattabbo. “Iti katvā”ti
anya-e0401n8:7_80: iti manasikatvā. “Taṁ”ti pacchimaṁ pādakajjhāna samāpajjanaṁ. “Idha nagahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:7_81: therassa matena daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo. Idha pana ādikammikavidhānappadhānattā pacchimaṁpi
anya-e0401n8:7_82: pādakajjhāna samāpajjanaṁ vattabbamevāti. “Kāyagatikaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā”ti ayaṁ kāyo
anya-e0401n8:7_83: viya idaṁ cittaṁpi dandhagamanaṁ hotūti evaṁ cittaṁ kāyagatikaṁ karaṇena adhiṭṭhahitvā.
anya-e0401n8:7_84: “Dissamānena kāyenā”ti dandhagamanena gacchantattā bahujanānampi dissamānena rūpakāyena.
anya-e0401n8:7_85: Tabbi parītena sīghagamanaṁ veditabbaṁ. “Ārammaṇamattaṁ hotī”ti anipphannarūpaṁ sandhāya
anya-e0401n8:7_86: vuttaṁ. “Ārammaṇa purejātaṁ”ti nipphannarūpaṁ. Itaraṁ pana hadaya vatthurūpaṁ sandhāya
anya-e0401n8:7_87: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Paracitta vijānanaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāṭīkācariyānaṁ vicāraṇā atthīti
anya-e0401n8:7_88: taṁ dassetuṁ “ettha ca aṭṭhakathāyaṁ tāvā”tiādi vuttaṁ. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ”ti dhammasaṅgaṇi
anya-e0401n8:7_90: Āvajjane niruddheti sambandho. “Ekaṁ cittaṁ”ti parassa cittaṁ. Tadeva atītaṁ cittaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_92: aññathā santati addhāvasena vuttanti gahite sati. Vutto siyā. Kasmā, santati addhāvasena
anya-e0401n8:7_93: paccuppanne gahite sati, sabbāya ekajavanavīthiyā ekapaccuppannattā. “Sabbāni cittānī”ti
anya-e0401n8:7_94: javanacittāni. “Sahuppannānī”ti idaṁ sahuppannānaṁpi atthitāya vuttaṁ. Āvajjanādīni
anya-e0401n8:7_95: pana khaṇabhedaṁ nagaṇhanti. Sabbaṁ parassa cittaṁ ekacittamiva gaṇhanti. Tasmā kālabhedopi
anya-e0401n8:7_96: natthīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Nibbānañcā”ti vuttaṁ, kathaṁ nibbānaṁ pubbenivutthaṁ nāma siyāti.
anya-e0401n8:7_97: Atīte parinibbutānaṁ maggaphalāni anussaraṇakāle tesaṁ ārammaṇabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁpi
anya-e0401n8:7_98: anussaratiyeva. Tattha tesaṁ maggaphalānaṁ atītattā nibbānaṁpi pubbenivutthaṁ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:8_0: “Yaṁ yaṁ adhiṭṭhātī”ti yaṁ yaṁ satādikaṁ saṁvidhāti. “Yathā yathā adhiṭṭhātī”ti yena
anya-e0401n8:8_2: pakativaṇṇasseva. Devānaṁ pasādasotanti sambandho. “Ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana samatthaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:8_3: ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṁ sampaṭicchana samatthaṁ. Tadeva cetopariyañāṇantipi vuccatīti
anya-e0401n8:8_4: sambandho. “Ceto”ti cittaṁ. “Paricchijjā”ti idaṁ sarāgacittaṁ, idaṁ virāgacittantiādinā
anya-e0401n8:8_5: paricchinditvā. “Gocara nivāsavasenā”ti gocaraṁ katvā nivasanavasena. Sabbaññutaññāṇagatikaṁ
anya-e0401n8:8_6: sabbaññubuddhānaṁ anāgataṁ saññāṇanti adhippāyo. Anāgate sattadivasato orimā cittacetasika
anya-e0401n8:8_7: dhammā cetopariyaññāṇassa visayoti katvā anāgate sattadivasatoti vuttaṁ. Paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n8:8_8: pavattamānāti pāṭhaseso. Imasmiṁ divase ca anāgatapakkhe sabbaṁpi ārammaṇaṁ pakatiñāṇassa
anya-e0401n8:8_9: visayoti katvā “dutīyadivasato paṭṭhāyā”ti vuttaṁ. “Etaṁ”ti etaṁ anāgataṁ saññāṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:8_10: “Yathā cetaṁ”ti yathā ca etaṁ imasmiṁ bhave anāgata dhamme jānāti. “Asādhāraṇakālavasenā”ti
anya-e0401n8:10_1: nāma sattapuggalādinimittameva. Sattanimittañhi paññatti dhammattā khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabhedābhāvato
anya-e0401n8:10_2: so evagacchati so eva tiṭṭhatītiādinā niccākārasaṇṭhitaṁ hotīti. “Dhuvanimittaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:10_3: thiranimittaṁ. Idampi so gacchantopi nanassati, tiṭṭhantopi nanassatītiādinā thirākārasaṇṭhitaṁ
anya-e0401n8:10_6: gantuṁ icchanto gacchati, ṭhātuṁ icchanto tiṭṭhatītiādinā vasavattanākāra saṇṭhitaṁ
anya-e0401n8:11_0: Visujjhatīti visuddhi. Visodhetīti vā visuddhi. Sīlameva visuddhi sīlavisuddhīti
anya-e0401n8:11_2: adhiṭṭhāna kiccasādhakattā idha adhippetanti vuttaṁ “niccasīlamevā”ti. Samādhi adhippeto.
anya-e0401n8:11_3: Vakkhatihi “duvidhopi samādhi cittavisuddhi nāmā”ti. Etena visujjhati etāyāti visuddhi.
anya-e0401n8:11_4: Cittassa visuddhi cittavisuddhi. Samādhi evātipi dīpeti. Visujjhanaṁ vā visuddhi.
anya-e0401n8:11_5: Cittassa visuddhi cittavisuddhi. Atthatopana visuddhacittameva vuccatītipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n8:11_6: Visuddhisadda sampanne hi sati, cittavisuddhi icceva vuccati. Na samādhivisuddhīti.
anya-e0401n8:11_7: “Soḷasavidhaṁ kaṅkhaṁ”ti ahosiṁ nu kho aha matītamaddhānantiādinā suttanteāgataṁ
anya-e0401n8:11_8: soḷasavidhaṁ vicikicchaṁ. “Aṭṭhavidhaṁ vā kaṅkhaṁ”ti sattharikaṅkhatītiādinā abhidhamme
anya-e0401n8:11_9: āgataṁ aṭṭhavidhaṁ vicikicchaṁ. Visamahetudiṭṭhi nāma sattānaṁ uppattiyā akāraṇameva
anya-e0401n8:11_11: Anupāyabhūto manasikāro nāma niccādivasena manasikāro. Adhimānavatthu nāma obhāsādīni.
anya-e0401n8:11_14: sammohamalato. Nanu dassananti ñāṇameva. Evaṁsati, ñāṇanti vutte siddhe katvā dassanasaddena
anya-e0401n8:11_15: saha ñāṇadassananti vuttanti āha “etthacā”tiādiṁ. “Sutamayādivasenā”ti sutamaya cintāmayavasena.
anya-e0401n8:11_16: Tattha yathāsutassa pāḷidhammassa atthamattajānanaṁ sutamayaññāṇaṁ nāma. Atthaṁ ñatvā
anya-e0401n8:11_17: atthānurūpassa sabhāvalakkhaṇassa cintanāvasena uppannaṁ ñāṇaṁ cintāmayaññāṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:11_20: sabbesu ṭhānesu. Ettha ca dasasu vipassanāñāṇesupi vipassanā vacanena paccakkhadassanameva
anya-e0401n8:11_21: adhippetanti katvā sabbatthaggahaṇaṁ katanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Sammasanaññāṇato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n8:11_22: hi dassanameva adhippetaṁ. Na sabhāvajānanamattaṁ. Yato cakkhunā passantasseva suṭṭhu
anya-e0401n8:11_23: paccakkhato dassanatthāya punappunaṁ bhāvanā kammaṁ nāma tattha icchitabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:12_0: “Dhammā”ti saṅkhata dhammā. Aniccatā eva lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇaṁ. Aniccānaṁ vā
anya-e0401n8:12_2: yathā sīghasotāyaṁ nadiyaṁ nāvāya uddhaṁ gacchantaṁ sānāvā abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena
anya-e0401n8:12_3: abhiṇhaṁ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā, asati abhisaṅkhāre taṅkhaṇe eva adhovuyhanato.
anya-e0401n8:12_4: Adhovuyhanañhi nāvāya pakati kiccaṁ. Uddhaṁ ārūhanaṁ abhisaṅkhāra siddhaṁ. Evamevaṁ
anya-e0401n8:12_5: sīghasote saṁsāre attabhāvena uddhaṁ khaṇato khaṇaṁ divasato divasaṁ gacchantaṁ puggalaṁ
anya-e0401n8:12_6: ayaṁ attabhāvo abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena abhiṇhaṁ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā, asati
anya-e0401n8:12_7: abhisaṅkhāre, paccayavekalle ca sati, taṅkhaṇe eva vipariṇamanato. Vipariṇamanañhi
anya-e0401n8:12_8: attabhāvassa pakati kiccaṁ. Uddhaṁgamanaṁ abhisaṅkhāra siddhaṁ. Evaṁ abhiṇha sampaṭippīḷanaṁ
anya-e0401n8:12_9: veditabbaṁ. Ettha ca saṁsārassa sīghasotatā nāma attabhāvapariyāpannānaṁ nāma rūpadhammānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:12_10: pavattinivatti sīghatā vuccati. Ettha ca maraṇaṁ duvidhaṁ sammuti maraṇañca paramattha
anya-e0401n8:12_11: maraṇañca. Tattha sammuti maraṇaṁ nāma sammuti saccabhūtassa sattassa maraṇaṁ. Taṁ
anya-e0401n8:12_12: ekabhavapariyante sandissati. Paramattha maraṇaṁ nāma paramattha saccabhūtānaṁ nāmarūpa
anya-e0401n8:12_13: dhammānaṁ maraṇaṁ. Idameva ekantamaraṇaṁ, saccamaraṇaṁ, sabhāvamaraṇaṁ hoti. Imasmiṁ
anya-e0401n8:12_14: vipassanā kamme idaṁ paramattha maraṇaṁ eva aniccatāti ca vuccati. Dhammānaṁ susānakkhettanti
anya-e0401n8:12_15: ca susānabhūmīti ca vuccatīti. Sā ca susānabhūmināma sattānaṁ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n8:12_16: santānaṁ anubandhatiyeva. Anubandhattā ca sattānaṁ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya so nāma
anya-e0401n8:12_17: samayo natthi, yattha sattā na marantīti. Idañca anubandhanaṁ sattānaṁ abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanameva
anya-e0401n8:12_18: hoti. Tesaṁ sabbiriyāpathesu jīvitassa ca aṅgapaccaṅgānañca kāyavacīmano kammānañca
anya-e0401n8:12_19: sambādhapattito. Avasavattanākāro pana abhisaṅkhāra dukkhaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccanubhavantānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:12_20: pākaṭoyeva. Vasavattanehi sati, abhisaṅkharaṇa kiccassa okāso natthi. Vasavattaneneva
anya-e0401n8:12_21: yathicchi tassa kiccassa sampajjanato. Lokasmiñhi sabbaṁpi abhisaṅkhāra kiccaṁ nāma
anya-e0401n8:12_22: antamaso assāsanapassāsana kiccaṁ upādāya dhammānaṁ vasavattanābhāvato karontīti.
anya-e0401n8:13_0: Aniccassa dhammassa anuanupassanāti sambandho. “Anuanupassanā”ti ca ñāṇacakkhunā
anya-e0401n8:13_1: punappunaṁ nijjhāyanā olokanā. “Dhammānaṁ”ti pañcakkhandha dhammānaṁ. “Yattha yatthā”ti
anya-e0401n8:13_2: yasmiṁ yasmiṁ sarīraṅge. “Purāṇa dhammānaṁ”ti purāṇānaṁ pātubbhūtānaṁ, vaḍḍhitānañca
anya-e0401n8:13_3: dhammakoṭṭhāsānaṁ antaradhānaṁ vayo vuccati. Vipassanā kammaṁ patvā khaṇikavasena
anya-e0401n8:13_4: ekekadhammavibhāgavasena ca anupassanā kiccaṁ natthīti āha “samūha santativasena
anya-e0401n8:13_5: panā”ti. Ekekadhammavibhāgavasena anupassanāpi pana pakatiyā supākaṭesu cittavedanādīsu
anya-e0401n8:13_6: icchitabbāyeva. “Aniccatāya paramākoṭī”ti tato uttari aniccatā nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:13_7: Dhammānaṁ tathā tathā bhāyitabbappakāro nāma pañcakkhandhe ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato,
anya-e0401n8:13_8: gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, tiādinā vutto bhāyitabbappakāro. Tassa samanupassanāñāṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:13_9: bhayañāṇaṁ. Etena apāyadukkha saṁsāra dukkhabhīrukehi janehi bhāyitabbanti bhayaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:13_10: Te vā bhāyanti etasmāti bhayaṁ. Bhayassa samanu passanāñāṇaṁ bhayañāṇanti imamatthaṁ
anya-e0401n8:13_13: Ukkaṇṭhatā nāma cittassa viruddhatā nikkhamābhimukhatā. “Cattālīsāya ākārehī”ti pañcakkhandhe
anya-e0401n8:13_14: ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, parato, palokato,
anya-e0401n8:13_15: ītito,. Upaddavato, bhayato, upasaggato, calato, pabhaṅguto, addhuvato, atāṇato,
anya-e0401n8:13_16: aleṇato, assaraṇato, rittato,. Tucchato, suññato, anattato, ādīnavato, vipariṇāma
anya-e0401n8:13_17: dhammato, asārakato, aghamūlato, vadhakato, vibhavato, sāsavato,. Saṅkhatato, mārāmisato,
anya-e0401n8:13_19: dukkhadomanassa dhammato, upāyāsa dhammato, saṁkilesika dhammato, passanto suññato
anya-e0401n8:13_20: lokaṁ avekkhatīti evaṁ mahāniddese moghapañhaniddese āgatehi cattālīsāya ākārehi.
anya-e0401n8:13_21: Tattha pañcakkhandhe aniccato passantotiādinā yojetabbaṁ. “Aniccato”ti ca aniccabhāvenāti
anya-e0401n8:13_22: attho. Sabbepi pañcakkhandhā aniccā evāti passantoti vuttaṁ hoti. Kathaṁ pana aniccato
anya-e0401n8:13_23: passanto suññato lokaṁ avekkhatīti. Niccaguṇa suññatāya suññato pañcakkhandhabhūtaṁ
anya-e0401n8:13_24: lokaṁ avekkhati. Sesapadesupi esevanayo. Tattha “aniccā evā”ti paṭisandhikkhaṇato
anya-e0401n8:13_25: paṭṭhāya yadākadāci maraṇa dhammattā aniccā eva. “Dukkhā evā”ti anicca dhammattāyeva
anya-e0401n8:13_26: dukkhā eva. Yadaniccaṁ, taṁ dukkhaṁtihi vuttaṁ. Dukkha saccadhammattā vā. “Rogā evā”ti
anya-e0401n8:13_27: rogajātikattā rogā eva. Yehi keci loke cakkhu rogādikā anekasahassā rogā nāma sandissanti.
anya-e0401n8:13_28: Sabbete imepañcakkhandhā eva. Ito aññokoci rogo nāma natthi. Tasmā te ekantena rogajātikā
anya-e0401n8:13_29: evāti. Api ca, dukkhasacca dhammattātīhi dukkhatāhi catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehi ca abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanato
anya-e0401n8:13_30: rujjanaṭṭhena rogā eva. Tattha “tīhi dukkhatāhī”ti dukkhadukkhatā saṅkhāra dukkhatā
anya-e0401n8:13_31: vipariṇāma dukkhatāti imāhi tīhidukkhatāhi. “Catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehī”ti dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho,
anya-e0401n8:13_32: saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho,ti imehi catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehi. Dukkha kiccehīti
anya-e0401n8:13_33: attho. Esanayo gaṇḍādīsu. Tattha gaṇḍonāma pīḷakābādho. Sallaṁ nāma vijjhanaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n8:13_34: kilesa sallañca dukkhasallañca. Aghanti niratthakaṁ. Ime ca khandhā vipattipariyosānattā
anya-e0401n8:13_35: niratthakā eva honti. Sabbāsampattiyo vipattipariyosānāti hi vuttaṁ. Avissāsikaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n8:13_36: pare eva. Na hi te etaṁ mama, eso hamasmi, eso me attāti evaṁ vissāsaṁ arahanti.
anya-e0401n8:13_37: Tathā vissāsaṁ karontassa nānādukkhehi niccaṁ vihiṁsanato. Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n8:13_38: yadākadāci palujjanadhammattā palokadhammā eva. “Ītī”ti antarāyo vuccati. Khandhā
anya-e0401n8:13_39: antarāya jātikā evāti vuttaṁ hoti. Ajjhattabhāvaṁ upagantvā dutattā vibādhakattā
anya-e0401n8:13_40: upaddavā eva. Bhāyitabbattā bhayā eva. Anattā eva samānā ajjhattabhāvaṁ upagantvā
anya-e0401n8:13_41: sajjanato lagganato dummo cayato upasaggā eva. Niccakālaṁ lokadhammehi calanattā
anya-e0401n8:13_42: vipphandanattā calāeva. Nānappakārena bhañjanadhammattā pabhaṅguno eva. Khaṇamattampi
anya-e0401n8:13_43: athirattā addhuvā eva. Jarāmaraṇādito apāyavinipatanādito bhayato tāyati rakkhatīti
anya-e0401n8:13_44: tāṇaṁ. Te ca khandhā kassacitāṇā na honti. Tesañca kiñcitāṇaṁ nāma natthi. Tasmā
anya-e0401n8:13_45: atāṇā eva. Bhayato bhīrukā janā līyanti nilīyanti etthāti leṇaṁ. Te ca kassacileṇā
anya-e0401n8:13_46: na honti. Tesañca kiñcileṇaṁ nāma natthi. Tasmā aleṇā eva. Bhayaṁ saratihiṁsatīti
anya-e0401n8:13_47: saraṇaṁ. Te ca kassacisaraṇaṁ na honti. Tesañca kiñcisaraṇaṁ nāma natthi. Tasmā assaraṇā
anya-e0401n8:13_48: eva. Niccatādīhi sabbehi sobhaṇaguṇehi sabbaso rahitattā tucchattā suññattārittā
anya-e0401n8:13_49: eva. Tucchā eva. Suññā eva. Attā vuccati yassakassaci koci sārabhūto paṭissaraṇo.
anya-e0401n8:13_50: Te sayañca kassaci attāna honti. Attano ca koci attānāma natthi. Tasmā anattā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_51: Aniccatādīhi ādīnavehi dosehi sampuṇṇattā ādīnavā eva. Vipariṇāma sabhāvattā vipariṇāmā
anya-e0401n8:13_52: eva. Sārabhūtassa kassaci adhiṭṭhānassa abhāvā asārāeva. Aghassa sabbaniratthakassa
anya-e0401n8:13_53: patiṭṭhānattā aghamūlā eva. Te sayaṁ maraṇa dhammasamaṅgīno hutvā tena maraṇasatthena
anya-e0401n8:13_54: maraṇāvudhena saṁsāre sattānaṁ niccaṁ mārakattā jīvitindriyupacchedakattā vadhakā
anya-e0401n8:13_55: eva. Niccasukhahita vuḍḍhivigatattā vibhavā eva. Āsavehi pariggahitattā sāsavā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_56: Niccakālaṁ paccayāyattavuttikattā saṅkhatā eva. Kilesamāramaccumārānaṁ āmisāhārattā
anya-e0401n8:13_57: mārāmisā eva. Anicchantasseva sato cakkhurogādibhāvena apāyabhavādibhāvena jātasabhāvattā
anya-e0401n8:13_58: jātidhammā eva. Anicchantasseva sato hāyanamaraṇasabhāvattā jarāmaraṇa dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_59: Sokādīnaṁ vatthubhāvena dhāraṇattā sokādi dhammā eva. Taṇhā saṁkilesa diṭṭhisaṁkilesa
anya-e0401n8:13_60: duccarita saṁkilesehi niyuttattā saṁkilesika dhammā evāti. Tena vuttaṁ “cattālīsāya
anya-e0401n8:14_0: Loke attajīvā nāma sattānaṁ ajjhatta dhammesu sāradhammā honti. Tesu vigatesu sesadhammā
anya-e0401n8:14_1: nissatta nijjīvabhāvaṁ patvā pheggubhūtā kacavarabhūtāti lokassa abhimāno. Te ca
anya-e0401n8:14_2: attajīvā nāma sabbaso natthīti diṭṭhe khandhesu kacavarabhāvadassanaṁ attajīva suññatā
anya-e0401n8:14_3: dassanaṁ nāma. “Vimuccamāno”ti etena vimuccatīti vimokkhoti atthaṁ dasseti. Vimuccanti
anya-e0401n8:14_4: etenāti vimokkhotipi yujjati. “Nimittānī”ti vipallāsadhammehi nimmitāni niccanimitta
anya-e0401n8:14_5: sukhanimitta attanimitta jīvanimittāni. Satta puggala itthi purisa hattha pāda sīsa
anya-e0401n8:14_6: gīvādīni nimittāni ca. Tattha saṅkhārānaṁ khaṇika dhammattā aniccānaṁyeva sataṁ santati
anya-e0401n8:14_7: ghanena paṭicchannattā hiyyopi so eva, ajjapi so evātiādinā niccākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:14_8: niccanimittaṁ nāma. Kilesamalehi pariggahitattā asubhānaṁyeva sataṁ avijjāya paṭicchannattā
anya-e0401n8:14_9: idaṁ iṭṭhaṁ, kantaṁ, manāpaṁ, piyarūpa, ntiādinā subhākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ subhanimittaṁ
anya-e0401n8:14_10: nāma. Bhayaṭṭhena akhemaṭṭhena dukkhānaṁpi sataṁ tāyeva paṭicchannattā idaṁ sukhaṁ,
anya-e0401n8:14_11: nibbhayaṁ, khemaṁ, sātarūpa, ntiādinā sukhākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ sukhanimittaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_12: Paccayā yattavuttikattā paccayena vinā kevalaṁ attano vasāyattavuttitā bhāvato anattānaṁyeva
anya-e0401n8:14_13: sataṁ attano icchāvasena karoti, katheti, cinteti, gantuṁ icchanto gacchati, ṭhātuṁ
anya-e0401n8:14_14: icchanto tiṭṭhatī, tiādinā vasavattanākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ attanimittaṁ nāma. Tathā
anya-e0401n8:14_15: sattonāma sattāhaṁpi jīvati, māsaṁpi jīvati, saṁvaccharaṁpi jīvatītiādinā jīvākārena
anya-e0401n8:14_16: upaṭṭhānaṁ jīvanimittaṁ nāma. Nanu cettha attano icchāvasena karotītiādīsu icchānāma
anya-e0401n8:14_17: taṇhāvāchando vā. Tadubhayampi cittasampayuttaṁ. Karaṇañca nāma kāyikakriyābhūtānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:14_18: cittajarūpakalāpānaṁ pavattiviseso. Evañcasati tesaṁ cittavasena pavattattā attano
anya-e0401n8:14_19: icchāvasena karotīti idaṁ abhidhammaviruddhaṁ na hotīti. Na na hoti. Attanoti ca
anya-e0401n8:14_20: karotīti ca vuttattā. Na hi attānāma atthi, yo attanoti vucceyya. Na ca kattānāma
anya-e0401n8:14_21: atthi, yo karotīti vucceyya. Idha pana tasmiṁ samaye pavattaṁ khandhapañcakameva
anya-e0401n8:14_22: attāti ca kattāti ca gahetvā attanoti ca karotīti ca vuttaṁ. “Avassayo hotī”ti patiṭṭhā
anya-e0401n8:14_23: hoti. “Vidhamitvā”ti ñāṇena antaradhāpetvā. Sabhāvato vijjamānāni na hontīti dassanañāṇena
anya-e0401n8:14_24: vinicchayaṁ pāpetvāti vuttaṁ hoti. Bhāvadassanaṁ nāma sokadukkhādīnaṁ abhāvadassanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:15_0: “Taṁ taṁ ghanavinibbhujjanavasenā”ti samūhasantati ghanādīnaṁ bhindana chindanavasena.
anya-e0401n8:15_1: Tattha samūhaghanabhindanaṁ ādito dhammavavatthānañāṇakiccaṁ. Tadā attadiṭṭhi vikkhambhitā
anya-e0401n8:15_2: hoti. Jīvadiṭṭhi ca nāma sukhumatarā attadiṭṭhi eva vuccati. Maggakkhaṇaṁ patvā eva
anya-e0401n8:16_0: “Pātimokkha”nti ettha “patī”ti jeṭṭhako vuccati. “Mukhaṁ”ti mūlakāraṇaṁ. Pati ca
anya-e0401n8:16_1: so mukhañcāti patimukhaṁ. Patimukhameva pātimokkhanti imamatthaṁ dassento “taṁ hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n8:16_2: Sabbalokiyasīlāni nāma catupārisuddhisīlāni. Tesaṁ majjhe. “Jeṭṭhakattā”ti jeṭṭhakasīlattā.
anya-e0401n8:16_4: dhammānaṁ. “Vipphanditāni nāmā”ti vippakiṇṇāni nāmāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “lolāni nāmā”ti.
anya-e0401n8:16_8: sannissitañcāti imehi tividhehi kuhanavatthūhi. Tividhehi acchariya kammavidhānehīti
anya-e0401n8:16_9: vuttaṁ hoti. Parisujjhatīti parisuddhi. Parisuddhi eva pārisuddhi. “Sammohassā”ti
anya-e0401n8:16_11: kassaviya gedhassa, abhikaṅkhassa. “Madassā”ti lābhasakkārā dimūlakassa mānamadassa.
anya-e0401n8:16_12: “Pamādassā”ti kusalesu dhammesu pamādassa muṭṭhassaccassa. Taṁ taṁ payojana mariyādo
anya-e0401n8:16_13: nāma cīvarapaccaye tāva sītappaṭighātādiko payojanamariyādo. “Mariyādo”ti ca yāvadevāti
anya-e0401n8:16_14: padena dassito sītappaṭighātādiko cīvarappayojana paricchedo. So ca cīvarapaccaye
anya-e0401n8:16_15: sammohādike sāvajjapakkhe apatanatthāya ṭhapito. Tena vuttaṁ “sammohassa gedhassa
anya-e0401n8:16_16: madassa pamādassa pahānatthaṁ”ti. Esanayo piṇḍapātapaccayādīsupi. Etena paccavekkhanāpāṭhesu
anya-e0401n8:16_17: ayamattho dassito. Idha bhikkhu cīvaraṁ paṭisevati yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa
anya-e0401n8:16_18: paṭighātāyātiādīsu yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya paṭisevati. Na tato uttari sammohatthāya
anya-e0401n8:16_19: gedhatthāya madatthāya pamādatthāya paṭisevatītiādi. Evañcasati, yaṁ cīvaraṁ paṭisevantassa
anya-e0401n8:16_20: sammohagedhamadappamādā uppajjanti. Taṁ na sevitabbaṁ. Itaraṁ sevitabbanti dassitaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:17_1: kāriyaṁ. Āsannapphalaṁ. Tenāha “aggissadhūmoviyā”ti. Āsannakāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ nāma
anya-e0401n8:17_2: aggikārako viya. Pajjati gacchati pavattati phalaṁ etenāti padaṁ. Tiṭṭhati phalaṁ
anya-e0401n8:17_3: etthāti ṭhānaṁ. Ubhayaṁpi kāraṇa pariyāyo eva. Tena atissayatthopi sijjhatīti āha
anya-e0401n8:17_5: Diṭṭhivippayuttā pana saññā citta vipallāsā vikkhambhituṁ sakkotīti na vattabbā.
anya-e0401n8:17_6: “Sāsana dhamme”ti anattalakkhaṇa suttantādike suññata dhammappaṭisaṁyutte desanādhamme.
anya-e0401n8:17_7: “Diṭṭhivipallāso vikkhambhito”ti tādisaṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā desake satthari ca desite
anya-e0401n8:17_8: dhamme ca saddhaṁ paṭilabhitvā saccameva bhagavā āha, ahaṁ pana etaṁ mama, esohamasmi,
anya-e0401n8:17_9: eso me attā,ti gaṇhāmi, micchāvatāyaṁ mamagāhoti evaṁ vikkhambhito hoti. Tato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n8:17_10: eso me attāti vadantopi diṭṭhisampayuttacittena na vadati. Diṭṭhivippayuttacittena
anya-e0401n8:17_11: eva vadatīti adhippāyo. Idampana daḷhaggāha vikkhambhanamattaṁ eva. Na attadassana
anya-e0401n8:17_12: vikkhambhanaṁ. Taṁ pana dhammavavatthānaññāṇe siddhe eva sijjhatītipi vadanti. Catunnaṁ
anya-e0401n8:17_13: āhārānaṁ vasena catudhā nāmarūpaṁ pariggahetabbameva. Kasmā, cattāro āhāre pariggahetvā
anya-e0401n8:17_15: siddhattāti adhippāyo. Pañcadhātiādīsu esanayo. Ādikammikānaṁ avisayo, visuṁ visuṁ
anya-e0401n8:17_16: lakkhaṇa rasādīhi pariggahetuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā. Pariggahaṇe sakkontassapi vipassanā
anya-e0401n8:17_17: kamme visuṁ visuṁ passituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā ca. Tathāhi vakkhati “kalāpavasena saṁkhipitvā”ti.
anya-e0401n8:17_18: “Aññassa kassacī”ti attajīvādikassa. So karoti kusalākusalaṁ kammaṁ. So paṭisaṁvedeti
anya-e0401n8:17_19: bhavantaraṁ patvā tabbipākaṁ. Saṁsarati bhavato bhavaṁ. Sandhāvati kammavegena khitto.
anya-e0401n8:17_20: Suddhe nāme eva vā rūpe eva vā īhābyāpārānaṁ abhāvadassanatoti yojanā. Puggalasattānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:17_21: kriyāyoti saññitāti viggaho. “Attāti pavattā diṭṭhī”ti kāraka diṭṭhi. “Tadatthā bhinivesavasenā”ti
anya-e0401n8:17_22: satto, puggalo, tiādi vohārassa sabbhāvato tassa atthabhūto sattapuggalādikopi sabhāvato
anya-e0401n8:17_23: atthiyeva. No natthīti evaṁ daḷhaṁ hadaye sannidhānakaraṇa vasena. “Atidhāvanañcā”ti
anya-e0401n8:17_24: vohāra paññattimatte aṭṭhatvā taṁ atikkamitvā pañcakkhandhe sattādibhāvena gahaṇañcāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:18_0: “Kammacittotukāhāravasenā”ti ettha kakāro sandhi vasena āgamo. Kammavasena cittavasena
anya-e0401n8:18_1: utuvasena āhāravasenāti attho. Anurūpānaṁ paccayānaṁ sāmaggīti viggaho. “Aññathā
anya-e0401n8:18_3: sambhārapaccayehi. Janaka paccayā hetupaccayā nāma. Parivārapaccayā sambhārapaccayā
anya-e0401n8:18_5: Ekassa sattassa anamatagge saṁsāre saṁsarantassa rūpakāyopi atthi nāmakāyopi atthi.
anya-e0401n8:18_6: Tato añño kocisabhāvo nāma natthi. Dve ca kāyā pañcavokāre saṁsarantassa ekato pavattanti.
anya-e0401n8:18_7: Asaññasatte saṁsarantassa rūpakāyo eva pavattati. So eva tattha ekosattoti saṅkhyaṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_8: gacchati. Arūpe saṁsarantassa nāma kāyo eva pavattati. So eva tattha eko sattoti
anya-e0401n8:18_9: saṅkhyaṁ gacchati. “Saṅkhyaṁ gacchatī”ti ca paññattimattaṁ gacchatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:18_10: Tesu ca kāyesu rūpakāye cuti paṭisandhīnaṁ aññamaññaṁ anantara paccayatā nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n8:18_11: Ekamekasmiṁ bhave ekameko hutvā cutikāle bhijjati. Rūpasantati chijjati. Paṭisandhirūpena
anya-e0401n8:18_12: saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho nappavattati. Nāma kāye pana cuti paṭisandhīnaṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_13: aññamaññaṁ anantarapaccayatā atthi. Cutikālepi nāmasantati na chijjati. Paṭisandhi
anya-e0401n8:18_14: nāmena saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho pavattatiyeva. Tattha paṭiccasamuppāda
anya-e0401n8:18_15: kusalo bhikkhu paṭiccasamuppādaññāṇe ṭhatvā ekasmiṁbhave ekassa sattassa pavattiṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_16: passanto sattaṁ nāma na passati. Puggalaṁ nāma na passati. Ahantipi na passati. Parotipi
anya-e0401n8:18_17: na passati. Ahaṁ atītesu bhavesu ahosintipi na passati. Imasmiṁbhave asmītipi na
anya-e0401n8:18_18: passati. Anāgatesu bhavissāmītipi na passati. Atha kho avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā pavattanti.
anya-e0401n8:18_19: Saṅkhāra paccayā bhavantare viññāṇaṁ pavattatītiādinā nayena nāmarūpa dhammānaṁ hetuphala
anya-e0401n8:18_20: paramparāvasena avicchedappavattimeva passati. Ekasmiṁbhave pavattiṁ passante sati,
anya-e0401n8:18_21: anamataggesaṁsāre anantesu bhavesu tassa sattassa pavatti diṭṭhā eva hoti tatthapi
anya-e0401n8:18_22: evameva, tatthapi evamevāti. Tadā tassa soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā pahīyatīti imamatthaṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_23: “dassento anamatagge saṁsāre”tiādimāha. Tattha katamā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhāti. Ahosiṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_24: nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhānaṁ. Na nu kho ahosiṁ. Kiṁ nu kho ahosiṁ. Kathaṁ nu kho ahosiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_25: Kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhānanti evaṁ pubbante pañcavidhā kaṅkhāvuttā.
anya-e0401n8:18_26: Bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ. Na nu kho bhavissāmi. Kiṁ nu kho bhavissāmi.
anya-e0401n8:18_27: Kathaṁ nu kho bhavissāmi. Kiṁ hutvā kiṁ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānanti
anya-e0401n8:18_28: evaṁ aparante pañcavidhā kaṅkhā vuttā. Ahaṁ nu kho smi. No nu kho smi. Kinnu kho
anya-e0401n8:18_29: smi. Kathaṁ nu kho smi. Ahaṁ nu kho satto kuto āgato. So kuhiṁ gāmī bhavissāmīti
anya-e0401n8:18_30: evaṁ paccuppanne chabbidhā kaṅkhā vuttā. Imā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhāti. Tattha ahosiṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_31: nu kho, na nu kho ahosinti iminā padadvayena atītakāle attano atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhati.
anya-e0401n8:18_32: Sace atthi, kiṁ nu kho ahosinti kaṅkhati. Kenaci hetunā paccayena vā ahosiṁ. Kenaci
anya-e0401n8:18_33: iddhimantena vā nimmito ahosiṁ. Ahetu apaccayā vā animmito vā sayaṁjāto ahosinti
anya-e0401n8:18_34: attho. Yadi tesupakāresu aññatarena ahosiṁ. Kathaṁ nu kho ahosiṁ. Apādakovā ahosiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_35: Dvipādako vā. Catuppādakovā. Bahuppādakovā. Rūpīvā. Arūpīvā. Saññīvā. Asaññīvā iccādi.
anya-e0401n8:18_36: Atha tesu apādakādīsu aññataro ahaṁ ahosiṁ. Kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ. Pathamabhave kiṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_37: hutvā dutīya bhavādīsu kiṁ ahosinti idaṁ bhavaparamparāvasena vuttaṁ. Esanayo aparantepi.
anya-e0401n8:18_38: Paccuppanne “ahaṁ nu kho smi, no nu kho smī”ti yathā khuddakavatthu vibhaṅge aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritesu.
anya-e0401n8:18_39: Satasmīti hoti. Sītasmīti hotīti vuttaṁ. Tattha “satasmī”ti ahaṁ sassato vā bhavāmi.
anya-e0401n8:18_40: “Sītasmī”ti ahaṁ ucchinnovā bhavāmīti attho. Yathā ca. Atthīti kho eko anto. Natthīti
anya-e0401n8:18_41: kho dutīyo antoti vuttaṁ. Tattha “atthī”ti attānāma bhavābhavesu niccakālaṁ atthi.
anya-e0401n8:18_42: “Natthī”ti tathā natthi, ucchijjati. Na hoti parammaraṇāti attho. Tathā idhāpi ahaṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_43: nu kho smi. No nu kho smīti kaṅkhati. Tattha “ahaṁ nu khosmī”ti ayaṁ ahaṁ nāma bhavābhavesu
anya-e0401n8:18_44: niccakālaṁ asmi nu kho, mama attānāma sassato hutvā sabbakālaṁ atthi nu khoti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_45: hoti. “No nu kho smī”ti tathā no asmi nu kho. Mama attā tathā natthi nu khoti attho.
anya-e0401n8:18_46: Ettha ca “bhavābhavesū”ti pavattepi paccuppanne vattamānaṁ attānaṁ gahetvā pavattā
anya-e0401n8:18_47: paccuppanne saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Kiṁ nu kho smī”ti ahaṁ nāma santo jāto kiṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_48: nu kho asmi. Kenaci hetunā paccayena vā asmi nu kho. Kenaci iddhimantena vā nimmito
anya-e0401n8:18_49: bhavāmi nu kho. Udāhu ahetu apaccayā vā kenaci animmito vā sayaṁ nu kho bhavāmi nu
anya-e0401n8:18_50: khoti attho. “Kathaṁ nu kho smī”ti ettha pana apadādīhi ayojetvā ahaṁ nu kho kiṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_51: gotto bhavāmi. Gotamagotto vā vāseṭṭha gotto vā tiādinā yojetabbaṁ. Ādi kappakāle
anya-e0401n8:18_52: tāni gottāni etarahi sambhedaṁ gacchanti. Tasmā tesu kaṅkhanto kaṅkhatiyeva. “Ahaṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_53: kuto āgato”ti ahaṁ atīte kutobhavato āgato asmi. “Sokuhiṁgāmī bhavissāmī”ti so ahaṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_54: āyatiṁ bhave kuhiṁ gāmiko bhavissāmīti kaṅkhati. “Kaṅkhāya atikkamo”ti so bhikkhu
anya-e0401n8:18_55: paṭiccasamuppāde avijjādikaṁ atītahetu pañcakaṁ passanto tasmiṁbhave sabbaṁpi paṭiccasamuppādaṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_56: passatiyeva. Evaṁ passanto na tattha ahaṁ nāma koci atthi, yaṁ paṭicca atīta visayā
anya-e0401n8:18_57: pañcavidhā kaṅkhā uppajjati. Dhamma mattameva tattha atthīti evaṁ atīte kaṅkhā vatthussa
anya-e0401n8:18_58: abhāvadassanena pañcavidhāya kaṅkhāya atikkamo hoti. Nanu tathā passantassapi kathaṁ
anya-e0401n8:18_59: nu kho smi, kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ nu khoti ayaṁ kaṅkhā atthiyeva. Tathā passantopi
anya-e0401n8:18_60: hi vinā pubbenivāsaññāṇena atīte bhave ahaṁ dvipādako ahosintivā catuppādako ahosinti
anya-e0401n8:18_61: vā tato cuto asukabhave uppannoti vā na jānāti na passatīti. Vuccate. Sā pana kaṅkhā
anya-e0401n8:18_62: dhamma mattappavatti dassanato paṭṭhāya antarāyika kaṅkhā na hoti. Vicikicchā paṭirūpikā
anya-e0401n8:18_63: eva. Sā hi ariyānaṁpi labbhati yevāti. Tathā anāgate phalapañcakaṁ passanto aparante
anya-e0401n8:18_64: pañcavidhaṁ kaṅkhaṁ atikkamati. Paccuppanne phalapañcakañca hetupañcakañca passanto
anya-e0401n8:18_65: paccuppanne kaṅkhā chakkaṁ atikkamati. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ pubbante vuttanayamevāti. Aṭṭhavidhāya
anya-e0401n8:18_66: kaṅkhāya atikkamane pana paṭiccasamuppādaṁ anulomappaṭilomaṁ passanto desanā dhamme
anya-e0401n8:18_67: ca lokuttara dhammesu ca kaṅkhaṁ atikkamati. Dhamme kaṅkhātikkamanena saheva desente
anya-e0401n8:18_68: satthari ca, yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipanne saṅghe ca, tīsu sikkhāsu ca, yathāvutte pubbante
anya-e0401n8:18_69: ca, aparante ca, pubbantā parantesu ca, paṭiccasamuppādena saha paṭiccasamuppannesu
anya-e0401n8:18_70: dhammesu ca sabbaṁ kaṅkhaṁ atikkamatiyeva. Tenāha “sabhāva dhammappavattiyā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_72: ca. Dhammasu dhammatā nāma desanā dhammassa svākkhātatādibhāvena sundara dhammatā.
anya-e0401n8:18_73: Anavajjadhammatā. Buddhasubuddhatā nāma taṁ dhammaṁ desentassa buddhassa sabbaññubuddhatā.
anya-e0401n8:19_0: Pariyuṭṭhitānaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ vikkhambhanaṁ nāma heṭṭhā dhammavavatthāna vasena
anya-e0401n8:19_1: paccayapariggahavasena ca sijjhati. Vipassanā kammaṁ pana anusayabhūtānaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_3: tasmiṁ paṭisambhidā magge pana. Vibhattesūti pāṭhaseso. “Yassā”ti yogī puggalassa.
anya-e0401n8:19_4: “Yaṁ dūre santikevā”ti yaṁ dūre pavattaṁ rūpaṁ vā, santike pavattaṁ rūpaṁvāti pāṭhaseso.
anya-e0401n8:19_6: suṭṭhuvibhūtaṁ katvāti adhippāyo. Idāni yaṁ yaṁ daḷhaṁ gahetabbaṁ. Taṁ taṁ sarūpato
anya-e0401n8:19_7: dassetuṁ “tatthā”tiādimāha. Puna daḷhaṁ gahitassa rūpassa aniccalakkhaṇaṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_8: “sā ca kriyā”tiādi vuttaṁ. “Nassantī”ti bhijjanti. Aniccataṁ gacchanti. “Vitthambhana
anya-e0401n8:19_9: kriyā”ti ettha vividhena thambhanaṁ vitthambhanaṁ. Nānādisābhimukhavasena thambhanaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_10: vahananti attho. “Imāsañcā”ti catunnaṁ mahābhūtānañca. Visuṁ visunti vuttattā tāsaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_11: aññamaññañca sahajātesu gahaṇaṁ sambhavatīti vuttaṁ “āpādīnaṁ”ti. Āpādīnaṁ sesamahābhūtānañcāti
anya-e0401n8:19_12: attho. Santatiyā sarīrāni santati sarīrāni. “Tathā tathā kappetvā”ti rūpadhammānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_13: santati parivatti nāma abhikkamantassa evaṁ bhaveyya, paṭikkamantassa evaṁ bhaveyya,
anya-e0401n8:19_14: tathā samiñjantassa pasārentassātiādinā parikappetvā. “Sesakhandhesupi taṁ taṁ santati
anya-e0401n8:19_15: nānattaṁ”ti vedanākkhandhe tāva kāye kāyikasukhasantati dukkhasantatīnaṁ nānattaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_16: Citte somanassa domanassa santatīnaṁ. Upekkhā santati pana avibhūtā hoti. Kappetvā
anya-e0401n8:19_17: gahetabbā. Yadā citte somanassa domanassāni na sandissanti, tadā idāni upekkhā me
anya-e0401n8:19_18: vedanā pavattatīti vā, yadā tāni sandissanti, tadā sā nirujjhatīti vā evaṁ takketvā
anya-e0401n8:19_19: sammasitabbāti vuttaṁ hoti. Saññākkhandhe rūpasaññāsaddasaññādīnaṁ vasena. Saṅkhārakkhandhe
anya-e0401n8:19_20: rūpasañcetanā saddasañcetanādīnaṁ vasena, nānāvitakka vicārādīnaṁ vasena, lobhālobha
anya-e0401n8:19_21: dosādosa mohāmohādīnaṁ vasena ca. Viññāṇakkhandhe cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṁ, kusalā kusalaviññāṇādīnañca
anya-e0401n8:19_22: vasena santati nānattaṁ veditabbaṁ. Vissāsaṁ karotīti vatvā tadatthaṁ vivarati “etaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_23: me”tiādinā. Tattha tayovissāsā taṇhāvissāso, mānavissāso, diṭṭhivissāso. Tattha etaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_24: mamāti taṇhāvissāso. Esohamasmīti mānavissāso. Eso me attāti diṭṭhivissāso. “Pariharatī”ti
anya-e0401n8:19_26: Ajjhattasārabhāvenāti vuttaṁ hoti. “Pariggahito”ti eso me attāti diṭṭhipariggahena
anya-e0401n8:19_27: pariggahito. Tayo hi pariggahā taṇhā pariggaho, mānapariggaho, diṭṭhipariggahoti.
anya-e0401n8:19_28: Vase sabbaso vattanto nāma kevalaṁ vasāyattavuttiko eva siyā, na paccayāyattavuttikoti
anya-e0401n8:19_30: kammābhisaṅkharaṇādīhi. “Tathāpariggahetabbo”ti eso me attāti evaṁ paramajjhattabhāvena
anya-e0401n8:19_31: pariggahetabbo. Tathā hi yo attano vasena vattati, tasmiṁ attano sāmibhāvo natthi.
anya-e0401n8:19_32: Yasmiñca sāmibhāvo natthi, tasmiṁ rūpādike dhamme attānaṁ sāmikaṁ katvā eso mama
anya-e0401n8:19_33: attāti pariggaho nāma micchā eva. Tathā yo ca khaṇika dhammo hoti, khaṇe khaṇe bhijjati,
anya-e0401n8:19_34: taṁ rūpādikaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ attano sāraṁ katvā tathā pariggahopi micchā eva. Ettha
anya-e0401n8:19_35: ca “micchā evā”ti paramattha saccaṁ patvā micchā eva. Vipallāso evāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:19_36: “Sukhaṁ viddhaṁsetī”ti kāyikasukhañca cetasika sukhañca viddhaṁseti. Vināseti. “Nānādukkhaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_37: janetī”ti kāyikadukkhañca cetasika dukkhañca janeti uppādeti. “Idañca rūpaṁ edisameva
anya-e0401n8:19_38: hotī”ti kathaṁ hoti. Manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṁ sattānaṁ yathāpavattaṁ manussa sukhaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_39: viddhaṁseti, jiṇṇabhinnabhāvaṁ pāpeti, nānādukkhaṁ janeti. Sayaṁ apāyattabhāvaṁ gahetvā
anya-e0401n8:19_40: tesaṁ nānāapāya dukkhaṁ janeti. Tathā devattabhāve sakkattabhāve brahmattabhāve ṭhitānantiādinā
anya-e0401n8:19_41: vattabbaṁ. Tathā manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṁ nānāvipariṇāma kiccehi yathāpavattaṁ sukhaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_42: viddhaṁseti, nānāpaccayābhisaṅkharaṇakiccehi nānādukkhaṁ janeti. Tena vuttaṁ “idañca
anya-e0401n8:19_43: rūpaṁ edisamevā”ti. “Sāronāma thāmabalaviseso vuccatī”ti etena thāmabalavisesena
anya-e0401n8:19_44: sampannaṁ vatthuṁpi saṅgaṇhāti. “Asārakaṭṭhenā”ti ettha sāro eva sārakaṁ, na sārakaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_45: asārakanti imamatthaṁ sandhāya “rūpaṁ pana sayaṁpi evarūpo sāro na hotī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_46: Sattānaṁ attasāro jīvasāro na hotīti attho. Natthi sāro etassāti asārakanti imamatthaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_47: sandhāya “na ca evarūpena sārena yuttaṁ”ti vuttaṁ. Attasārena jīvasārena saṁyuttaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_48: hotīti attho. Tattha purimo attho rūpaṁ attato samanupassatīti idaṁ sandhāya vutto.
anya-e0401n8:19_49: Pacchimo rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ, attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁti imāni sandhāya
anya-e0401n8:19_50: vutto. Etena asārakaṭṭhenāti asārabhāvena, asārayuttabhāvena vāti ca. Anattāti etthapi
anya-e0401n8:19_51: na attā anattā, natthi attā etassāti vā anattāti ca dvidhā attho sijjhati. “Yañcā”ti
anya-e0401n8:19_52: yañca rūpaṁ. “Pīḷetī”ti taṁ samaṅgī puggalaṁ pīḷeti. Etena anattabhāve siddhe dukkhabhāvopi
anya-e0401n8:19_53: siddhoti dasseti. “Tiṇṇaṁ vayānaṁ vasena addhābhedo yojetabbo”ti pathamavaye pavattaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_54: rūpaṁ dutīyavayaṁ na pāpuṇāti, pathamavaye eva nirujjhatītiādinā addhāpaccuppanne
anya-e0401n8:19_56: ekībhūtā santati sabhāgekasantati. “Sabhāgānaṁ dhammānaṁ”ti ca cittajesutāva nirantarappavattena
anya-e0401n8:19_57: lobhasampayuttacittena sahajātā rūpadhammā sabhāgarūpadhammā nāma. Tathā nāma dhammā
anya-e0401n8:19_58: ca. Evaṁ dosasampayuttādīsupi. Utujesu nirantarappavattena sītautunā samuṭṭhitā rūpadhammā
anya-e0401n8:19_59: sabhāgarūpa dhammā nāma. Tathā uṇhautunā samuṭṭhitā. Esanayo āhārajesupīti evaṁ sabhāgekasantativasena.
anya-e0401n8:19_61: sammasanaṁ visesato adhippetaṁ. Evañca katvā heṭṭhā aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenāti pade catunnaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_62: mahābhūtānaṁ santati vibhāganayo suṭṭhu dassitoti. “Aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:19_63: imasmiṁ ñāṇepi udayabbayaññāṇepi bhaṅgaññāṇepi aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_64: Bhayaññāṇe ca ādīnavaññāṇe ca nibbidāñāṇe ca dukkhalakkhaṇa dassanaṁ padhānaṁ. Upari
anya-e0401n8:19_65: catūsu ñāṇesu anattalakkhaṇa dassanaṁ padhānanti. “Samuditesū”ti aññamaññaṁ avinābhāvasahāyabhāvena
anya-e0401n8:19_66: samuppannesu. Idañca avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo. Taṇhāsamudayā upādāna samudayo.
anya-e0401n8:19_67: Āhāra samudayā rūpasamudayoti pāḷivasena vuttaṁ. Appahīna vasenāti pāḷipade pana
anya-e0401n8:19_68: avijjā taṇhā diṭṭhānusayānaṁ appahīnaṭṭhena santāne vijjamānatā eva pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_69: “Samudentī”ti paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya ekato udenti. Uparūpari enti. Āgacchantīti attho.
anya-e0401n8:19_71: pavaḍḍhamānā savanti, pavattanti, sandanti. “Tesu panā”ti avijjā taṇhupādāna kammesu.
anya-e0401n8:19_72: “Nirujjhantī”ti tasmiṁbhave eva nirujjhanti. Tasmiṁ bhave nirodho nāma bhavantare
anya-e0401n8:19_73: puna anuppādo yevāti vuttaṁ “bhavantare”tiādi. “Taṁ santatiyaṁ”ti tasmiṁ paccuppanna
anya-e0401n8:19_74: bhaveti vuttaṁ hoti. “Puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṁ nirodhaṁ”ti santati nirodho nāma vutto.
anya-e0401n8:19_75: Na nibbāna nirodho. Etāhi paccaye sati, bhavantare uppajjīssanti yevāti. Idāni yathāpavatta
anya-e0401n8:19_76: santatīsu pariyāpannānaṁ sabbapacchimānaṁ nāmarūpānaṁ khaṇikanirodhavasena atthaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_77: vadanto “yathāpavatta santatiyo vā chijjanti bhijjantī”ti vuttaṁ. “Udayabbayaṁ samanupassantassa
anya-e0401n8:19_78: cā”ti ettha katamo udayo nāma, katamo vayo nāma, kathañca tadubhayaṁ samanupassatīti
anya-e0401n8:19_79: āha “udayabbayaṁ passantassāti ettha yathā nāmā”tiādiṁ. Tattha “tamo khandho”ti tamorāsi.
anya-e0401n8:19_80: “Vetī”ti vigacchati. Antara dhāyati.“Udayo”ti uppādo ceva vaḍḍhi ca. “Vayo”ti vigamanaṁ,
anya-e0401n8:19_82: nānāsantatīnaṁ udayañca udayato. Vayapakkhānaṁ nānāsantatīnaṁ vayañca vayatoti yojanā.
anya-e0401n8:20_0: Bojjhaṅga dhammehi sampannattā ārādheti attano cittaṁti āraddho. Tuṭṭhacittoti attho.
anya-e0401n8:20_1: Vipassatīti vipassako. Āraddho hutvā vipassako āraddhavipassako. Duvidhohi vipassako
anya-e0401n8:20_2: taruṇa vipassako ca āraddha vipassako ca. Tattha khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ suṭṭhu apassanto
anya-e0401n8:20_3: dubbalavipassako taruṇa vipassako nāma. Khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ suṭṭhu passanto vipassanā
anya-e0401n8:20_4: kamme ārādhita citto balavavipassako āraddhavipassako nāma. Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:23: Amānusī ratī hoti, samma dhammaṁ vipassato,ti ca.
anya-e0401n8:26: Ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo, passato udayabbayaṁ,ti ca.
anya-e0401n8:27_0: Ayamidha adhippeto. Vipassanaṁ upecca kilesenti, malīnabhāvaṁ gamentīti vipassanupakkilesā.
anya-e0401n8:27_1: Paribandhanti nīvārentīti paribandhakāti heṭṭhā vuttameva antarāyika dhammānaṁ nāmaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_2: “Sarīrobhāso”ti sakalasarīrato nikkhanto obhāso. “Pañcavidhā pītī”ti khuddikā pīti,
anya-e0401n8:27_3: khaṇikā pīti, okkantikā pīti, ubbegā pīti, pharaṇā pītīti. “Duvidhā passaddhī”ti
anya-e0401n8:27_4: atibalavantī kāyapassaddhiceva cittapassaddhi ca. Vipassanā kamme okappanākārappavattā
anya-e0401n8:27_5: saddhāeva adhimuccanaṭṭhena adhimokkho saddhādhimokkho. “Vīriyaṁ”ti tasmiṁ kamme
anya-e0401n8:27_8: kamme appamuṭṭhā sati. “Tatramajjhattupekkhā”ti cittassa līnuddhaccādīhi visamantehi
anya-e0401n8:27_11: missakattā idaṁ akusalantipi jānituṁ asakkuṇeyyā sukhumataṇhā. “Na vatame”ti mama
anya-e0401n8:27_12: na uppannapubbovatāti yojanā. “Assādasahitā”ti obhāsādīsu assādataṇhā sahitā. “Adhimāna
anya-e0401n8:27_15: “Handā”ti cittavissaṭṭhakaraṇe nipātapadaṁ. Idāneva naṁ visodhemi, na ciraṁ pavattituṁ
anya-e0401n8:27_16: dassāmīti imamatthaṁ dīpeti. “Tesvevā”ti tesuobhāsādīsu eva. Aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
anya-e0401n8:27_17: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ nikanti vikkhambhanassa visuṁ vuttattāti adhippāyo. Vipassanāparipāko
anya-e0401n8:27_19: Vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanābhāvapattenāti vuttaṁ hoti. “Dve vipassanā cittānī”ti upacārānulomacittāni.
anya-e0401n8:27_20: So hi vuṭṭhānanti vuccatīti sambandho. Saṅkhāra nimittato vā vuṭṭhāti. Nibbānaṁ ārabbha
anya-e0401n8:27_21: pavattito. Yadi evaṁ gotrabhupi vuṭṭhānaṁ nāma siyāti. Na siyā. Maggassa āvajjanamatte
anya-e0401n8:27_22: ṭhitattā. Paṭivedhakiccassaca sammoha samucchedakiccassa abhāvato. “Sayaṁ”ti maggasaṅkhāto
anya-e0401n8:27_23: sayaṁ. “Taṁ samaṅgīpuggalaṁ vā”ti tena maggena samaṅgīpuggalaṁ vā. “Vaṭṭappavattato
anya-e0401n8:27_24: cā”ti āyatiṁ bhavesu apāyavaṭṭappavattato vā, aṭṭhama bhavato paṭṭhāya kāmasugati
anya-e0401n8:27_25: vaṭṭappavattato vā. Avassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ gameti sampāpetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n8:27_26: “Avassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ gacchantī”ti idha ṭhitānaṁ vuṭṭhānato nivatti nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:27_27: Idañca paccekabuddhānaṁ buddhasāvakānañca vasena daṭṭhabbaṁ. Sabbaññu bodhisattā
anya-e0401n8:27_28: pana pubbabuddhānaṁ sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanā kammaṁ ārabhantā anulomaññāṇaṁ āhacca
anya-e0401n8:27_29: ṭhapentīti aṭṭhaka thāsu vuttaṁ. Tattha “āhaccā”ti idaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa matthakapattidassanatthaṁ
anya-e0401n8:27_30: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṁ”ti tato pubbabhāge kenaci cittena aggahite
anya-e0401n8:27_31: nibbānā rammaṇe āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṁ. “Taṁ”ti gotrabhuññāṇaṁ. Gottaṁ bhavati abhibhavati
anya-e0401n8:27_32: chindatīti gotrabhu. Gottaṁ vā abhisambhuṇāti pāpuṇātīti gotrabhūti vacanattho. Kathaṁ
anya-e0401n8:27_33: pana gotrabhu cittaṁ gotrabhuññāṇaṁ puthujjanagottaṁ chindati, ariyagottaṁ pāpuṇātīti
anya-e0401n8:27_34: yujjeyya, sohi puggalo tasmiṁkhaṇe puthujjanagottapariyāpannoevāti. Saccaṁ. Attani
anya-e0401n8:27_35: pana chinnattā sayaṁ chindati nāma. Nibbānassa ca ariyagocarattā taṁ ārammaṇa karaṇavasena
anya-e0401n8:27_36: ariyagottaṁ pāpuṇāti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Paccayasattivisesena attano anantare ariyagottaṁ
anya-e0401n8:27_37: bhāveti, pātubhāvetīti gotrabhūtipi yujjati. “Paricchijjā”ti paricchinditvā. Diṭṭhivicikicchādīhi
anya-e0401n8:27_38: sabbavipphandanehi muñcitvāti vuttaṁ hoti. Sammohassa pahānameva daṭṭhabbaṁ. Na te
anya-e0401n8:27_39: dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena jānanaṁ. Kathaṁ te dhamme ārammaṇaṁ akaronto maggo
anya-e0401n8:27_40: te dhamme parijānāti nāmāti. Kiccasiddhi vasena. So hi sammohaṁ pajahanto ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:27_41: karontānipi hi pubbabhāgaññāṇāni tappahānakiccassa asādhakattā dukkha saccaṁ parijānantānīti
anya-e0401n8:27_42: na vuccanti. Maggo pana ārammaṇaṁ akarontopi tappahānakiccassa sādhakattātaṁ saccaṁ
anya-e0401n8:27_43: parijānātīti vuccati. Kasmā. Tato paṭṭhāya tassapuggalassa sabbakālaṁ tasmiṁsacce
anya-e0401n8:27_44: parijānana kiccassa siddhattā. Yathāhi eko puriso cakkhumhi pittasemhādidosehi palibuddhattā
anya-e0401n8:27_45: andho hoti. Na kiñci passati. Yadā pana so ekaṁ tejavantaṁ añjanaṁ labhitvā cakkhuṁ
anya-e0401n8:27_46: añjayanto sabbarattiṁ niddāyati. Tassa niddāyantasseva cakkhumhi sabbadosā nassanti.
anya-e0401n8:27_47: Cakkhu vippasannaṁ hoti. Taṅkhaṇato paṭṭhāya so niddāyantopi rūpāni passatīti vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:27_48: Kasmā, andhabhāvavigamena dassanakiccassa siddhattā. Evamevamidaṁ daṭṭhabbanti. Ekadesena
anya-e0401n8:27_49: vā heṭṭhimamaggesu, anavasesena vā arahattamagge. “Apacchāvattikaṁ”ti ettha pacchato
anya-e0401n8:27_50: āvattanaṁ pacchāvattaṁ. Natthi pacchāvattaṁ assāti apacchāvattikanti viggaho. “Puna
anya-e0401n8:27_51: anuppādadhammatāpattivasena nirodhasaṅkhātaṁ”ti maggakkhaṇe eva tānivaṭṭāni puna
anya-e0401n8:27_53: bhāvanāyā”ti etena maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā vaḍḍhanasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāya okāso
anya-e0401n8:27_54: natthīti katvā vuttaṁ. Ariyamaggaṁ paṭilābhatthāya pana pavattitā pubbabhāgabhāvanāpi
anya-e0401n8:27_55: maggabhāvanā eva. Sā ca ariyamaggaṁ patvā matthakapattā hoti. Tasmā ariyamaggo eva
anya-e0401n8:27_56: matthakapatto bhāvanānuttaro hotīti imināpariyāyena vaḍḍhana saṅkhātāya bhāvanāyātipi
anya-e0401n8:27_57: yujjatiyeva. Attano anantare pavattaṁ ānantarikaṁ. Ānantarikaṁ phalaṁ etassāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n8:27_58: Tassa ca tatoparaṁ dve vā tīṇi vā phalacittāni pavattantīti iminā sambandho. Apanīto
anya-e0401n8:27_59: aggi etasmāti apanītaggiko. “Nibbāpento viyā”ti etena paṭippassambhanappahānakiccena
anya-e0401n8:27_60: maggānukulappavattiṁ dasseti. “Tesaṁ”ti tesaṁ cakkhūnaṁ. Taṁ rūpaṁ tassa pākaṭaṁ
anya-e0401n8:27_61: na tāva hotīti sambandho. “Tassā”ti tassa puggalassa. “Paccavekkhanavāresū”ti ettha
anya-e0401n8:27_62: pasādacakkhunā diṭṭhe pavattā anubandhaka vīthiyopi saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n8:28_1: asukākilesā pahīyantīti evaṁ kilesavibhāgesu. “Pāḷiyaṁ”ti paṭisambhidā maggapāḷiyaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:28_2: Vuccamāne pana vattabbanti sambandho. Maggaṅgabojjhaṅgādīnaṁ paccavekkhanaṁ nāma
anya-e0401n8:28_3: maggapaccavekkhanameva. Tathā pacchā vā pavattatīti siddhaṁ. “Aviruddhā hotī”ti visuddhimaggena
anya-e0401n8:28_6: ariyabhūto bhikkhu. “No laddhuṁ na vaṭṭatī”ti aladdhuṁ na vaṭṭatīti attho. Laddhuṁ
anya-e0401n8:28_7: no na vaṭṭatīti vā yojanā. Catubbidhaṁ maggaññāṇaṁ gahitaṁ. Ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāmāti vuttattā.
anya-e0401n8:29_1: tassa pavattanaṁ viya. “Kevalaṁ paccayāyatta vuttitāya adiṭṭhattā”ti etena eso me
anya-e0401n8:29_2: attā, na parassa attāti evaṁ attānaṁ attassa sāmikaṁ katvā gahaṇakāraṇaṁ vadati.
anya-e0401n8:29_3: Tattha kevalasaddena paramattha saccaṁ patvā attasseva abhāvato khandhapañcakassa
anya-e0401n8:29_4: attanovasāyatta vuttitaṁ nivatteti. Sammuti saccaṁ pana patvā attassa vijjamānattā
anya-e0401n8:29_5: mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṁ attano vasāyatta vuttiṁ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:29_6: “Khaṇabhaṅgassa ca adiṭṭhattā”ti etena eso me sāraṭṭhena attā. Eso mama sāro. Etaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_7: mama sarīraṁ. Yāva vassasataṁpi vassasahassampi etaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ na bhijjati,
anya-e0401n8:29_8: na vinassati. Tāva ahaṁ na marāmi. Yadā etaṁ bhijjati, vinassati. Tadā ahaṁ marāmi.
anya-e0401n8:29_9: Ahañca mama khandhapañcakañca advayaṁ anānattanti evaṁ gahaṇakāraṇaṁ vadati. Tattha
anya-e0401n8:29_10: “khaṇabhaṅgassā”ti nāmarūpadhammānaṁ khaṇe khaṇe bhañjanassa bhijjanassa maraṇassa.
anya-e0401n8:29_11: Idampanamaraṇaṁ sammuti sacce natthi. Paramattha sacce eva atthi. Tasmā taṁ apassanto
anya-e0401n8:29_12: mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṁ attanosāraṁ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhātīti. “Taṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_13: dvayaṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ katvā”ti khandhapañcakassa kevalaṁ paccayāyatta vuttitañca khaṇabhaṅgañca
anya-e0401n8:29_14: ñāṇa cakkhunā suṭṭhudiṭṭhaṁ katvā. Tattha pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_15: suṭṭhupassanto kevalaṁ paccayāyatta vuttitañca avasāyatta vuttitañca suṭṭhu passati.
anya-e0401n8:29_16: Yo ca attano vasāyattavutti na hoti. So paramatthasaccaṁ patvā eso mama santakantipi
anya-e0401n8:29_17: vattuṁ nārahati. Kuto mama attāti. Api ca, satto nāma sabhāvato natthi. Paññattimattaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_18: hoti. Yo ‘ahanti vā, meti vā, mamāti vā, gayheyya. Asante ca attasmiṁ ko mama attā
anya-e0401n8:29_19: nāma bhaveyyāti. Khaṇabhaṅgo hoti. Khaṇe khaṇe bhijjati. Satto ca nāma ekasmiṁbhave
anya-e0401n8:29_20: ādimhi sakiṁ eva jāyati. Ante sakiṁ eva marati. Antarā vassasataṁpi vassasahassaṁpi
anya-e0401n8:29_21: maraṇaṁ nāma natthi. Aññāhi khaṇikadhammānaṁ gati. Aññā sattassa. Evaṁsante kathaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_22: khaṇikadhammā sattassa sāraṭṭhena attānāma bhaveyyunti. Tasmā te avasavattanaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n8:29_23: asārakaṭṭhena ca anattā eva. Apica “avasavattanaṭṭhenā”ti ettha vaso nāma sattasantāne
anya-e0401n8:29_24: eko padhānadhammo. Sace attānāma atthi. So eva padhānabhūtassa vasassapi attā bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n8:29_25: Evaṁsati, yo vaso, so attā. Yo attā, so vasoti bhaveyya. Tathā ca sati, rūpaṁ attāti
anya-e0401n8:29_26: gaṇhanto rūpañca vasañca attānañca ekattaṁ katvā gaṇhāti nāma. Tathā vedanaṁ attāti.
anya-e0401n8:29_27: Saññaṁ, saṅkhāre, viññāṇaṁ attāti gaṇhantepi. Evañcasati, satto ca khandhapañcakañca
anya-e0401n8:29_28: vaso ca attā ca sabbametaṁ ekattaṁ gacchati, eko sattoti saṅkhyaṁ gacchati. Na hi
anya-e0401n8:29_29: imasmiṁ vasavattanaṭṭhe ekassasattassa dve attā tayo attā bahūattāti sakkā bhavituṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_30: Atha yathā yathā sattassa vaso vattati, icchā pavattati. Tathā tathā khandhapañcakampi
anya-e0401n8:29_31: niccakālaṁ sattassavasaṁ anugaccheyya. Kasmā, sattassa ca khandhapañcakassa ca vasassa
anya-e0401n8:29_32: ca nānattābhāvato. Evaṁ anugacchante sati. Rūpaṁ me attā, vedanā me attātiādiggahaṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_33: vaṭṭeyya. Sabhāvato aviruddhaṁ bhaveyya. Na pana tathā anugacchati. Na hi dubbaṇṇo
anya-e0401n8:29_34: durūpo puriso attano rūpakāyaṁ attano vaseneva suvaṇṇaṁ surūpaṁ kātuṁ sakkoti. Tathā
anya-e0401n8:29_35: dussaddovā susaddaṁ, duggandhovā sugandhaṁ. Na ca andhovā anandhaṁ. Badhirovā abadhiraṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_36: Rogīvā arogaṁ. Kuṭṭhīvā akuṭṭhaṁ. Gaṇḍīvā agaṇḍaṁ. Jiṇṇovā taruṇaṁ. Ajaraṁ vā amaraṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_37: vā kātuṁ sakkoti. Nāpi apāyesu ca apatantaṁ. Patitvā vā tato vimuttaṁ kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_38: Tathā devo vā devattā acāvetuṁ. Sakkovā sakkattā, māro vā mārattā, brahmā vā brahmattāti.
anya-e0401n8:29_39: Esanayo sesakhandhesupi. Tathā pana avasānugamanato paramattha saccaṁ patvā khandhapañcake
anya-e0401n8:29_40: attano sāmikiccaṁ issarakiccaṁ nāma natthi. Asāmikameva taṁ hoti, anissaraṁ. Tathā
anya-e0401n8:29_41: ca sati, attānaṁ tassa sāmiṁ issaraṁ katvā rūpaṁ me attāti gahaṇaṁ micchāgahaṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_42: nāma hotīti. Loke pana mahājano dhammānaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ na jānanti, na passanti,
anya-e0401n8:29_43: na paṭivijjhanti. Tesaṁ parampara paccayavasena pavattamāne khandhasantāne sammuti
anya-e0401n8:29_44: saccavasena nānāvasavattanākārā nāma santi. Nānāsāmi issarādhipativohārā ca loke
anya-e0401n8:29_45: sandissanti. Te sammuti saccavasena uppannesu tesu sāmiissarādhipati vohāresu vohāramatte
anya-e0401n8:29_46: aṭhatvā sabhāvasaccaṁ maññantā micchāgahaṇaṁ gaṇhanti. Ettha siyā. Na nu vasonāma
anya-e0401n8:29_47: icchā. Satto ca gantuṁ icchanto gacchati. Ṭhātuṁ icchanto tiṭṭhati. Evaṁsati. Tassa
anya-e0401n8:29_48: khandhapañcakaṁ tassa vasāyatta vutti eva hotīti. Na hoti. Kasmā, paccayāyatta vuttittā
anya-e0401n8:29_49: eva. Tathāhi gantuṁ icchānāma bahiddhā dhanahetuvā uppajjeyya. Nānābhogahetu vā.
anya-e0401n8:29_50: Aññena vā nānākāraṇena. Tattha yesaṁ dhane asati, yaṁ yaṁ dukkhaṁ āgaccheyya kāyikaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_51: vā cetasikaṁ vā. Tesaṁ taṁ taṁ dukkhapaccayā dhanicchā nāma uppajjati. Dhanicchā
anya-e0401n8:29_52: paccayā ganticchādayo uppajjanti. Tathā nānābhogicchā nānākammicchāsu cāti. Nānādukkhabhayupaddavamūlikāsu
anya-e0401n8:29_53: icchāsu vattabba meva natthi. Tathā nānārammaṇānaṁ palobhana dukkhamūlikāsu ca nānāvitakkānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_54: vipphandanamūlikāsu ca icchāsu. Evaṁ vasopi paccayāyatta vuttiko eva hoti. “Gamanaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:29_55: gamanākārena pavattaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ. Yenayenadhanādihetunā so so vaso uppajjati.
anya-e0401n8:29_56: Gamanampi tena teneva uppajjati āhārupatthambhanādipaccayena ca. Vaso pana gamanassa
anya-e0401n8:29_57: paccayeka desamattaṁ hoti. So hi tadaññapaccayehi vinā sayaṁ uppajjituṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_58: Kuto gamanaṁ uppādetuṁ. Evaṁ ṭhānādīsu. Evañca sati, idaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ paccayāyatta
anya-e0401n8:29_59: vuttikanticceva vattuṁ arahati. No vasāyatta vuttikanti. Api ca gantuṁ icchanto gacchatīti
anya-e0401n8:29_60: paññatti mattabhūto satto gacchati. Khandhapañcakaṁ pana khaṇika dhammattā na gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:29_61: Uppannuppannaṁ tattha tattheva bhijjati. Santati vasena gamanākāra nimittaṁ paññāyati.
anya-e0401n8:29_62: Evaṁ avasavattanaṁ hotīti. Hotu tattha tattheva bhijjanaṁ. Avicchedappavattiyā sati,
anya-e0401n8:29_63: gamanaṁ sampajjatiyeva. Gamane ca sampajjamāne khaṇikabhijjanena doso natthīti ce.
anya-e0401n8:29_64: Atthi. Khaṇikamaraṇañhi sattassa susānabhūmi nāma hoti. Antarāyevā āgate pakkhalante
anya-e0401n8:29_65: vā sati, gacchanto satto yadā kadāci maraṇaṁ vā nigacchati maraṇa mattaṁ vā dukkhanti.
anya-e0401n8:29_66: Kilese nimināti pavattetīti nimittanti vacanattho. “Vipallāsanimittaṁ”ti ca vipallāsa
anya-e0401n8:29_67: dhammānaṁ vasena upaṭṭhitaṁ kicca nimittaṁ. Taṇhā eva paṇidhīti sambandho. Mahantānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_68: ādīnavānaṁ rāsi mahāādīnavarāsi. Khandhesu suññatalakkhaṇaṁ nāma ati gambhīraṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_69: Ñāṇasseva visayabhūtaṁ. Suññata dassanañca diṭṭhiyā ujuppaṭipakkhanti āha “saṅkhāresu
anya-e0401n8:29_71: atthassa siddhi nāma. Attāti abhiniveso attābhiniveso. Gaṇhātīti gāho. Upādīyatīti
anya-e0401n8:29_72: attho. Diṭṭhisaṅkhāto gāho diṭṭhiggāho. Atthābhiniveso ca so diṭṭhiggāho cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n8:29_73: Tassa paṭipakkhaṁ anattānupassanāñāṇaṁ. Anu anu bhavanaṁ ānubhāvo. Paramparato vaḍḍhananti
anya-e0401n8:29_74: attho. “Tathā samanupassitvā”ti suññatā kārena samanupassitvā. Vimuñcantassa ariyapuggalassa.
anya-e0401n8:29_75: “Aniccalakkhaṇaṁ nāma nāti gambhīraṁ hoti. Saddhāyapi visayabhūtaṁ. Unnatilakkhaṇo
anya-e0401n8:29_76: ca ahaṁ māno khandhesu niccadhuvavipallāsamūlako saddhāya ca paṭipakkhoti āha “aniccadassanavasenā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_78: mānasaṅkhātassa gāhassa. “Saddhāya pī”tipisaddena ñāṇaṁ sampiṇḍeti. Dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:29_79: nāma bhayasaṁvega janakaṁ hoti. Ārammaṇesu taṇhālolassa taṇhāvipphandanassa paṭipakkhaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_80: Visesato samādhissa anurūpanti āha “dukkhadassana vasenā”tiādiṁ. “Tiṇṇaṁ dhammānaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:29_81: paññindriya saddhindriya samādhindriya saṅkhātānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ indriya dhammānaṁ. “Vipassanā
anya-e0401n8:29_82: gamanavasene vā”ti vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanā saṅkhātassa āgamana kāraṇassa vaseneva.
anya-e0401n8:30_0: Idāni pubbe yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘sattaariya puggalavibhāgassa paccayabhāvapattiyā cā’ti. Tattha
anya-e0401n8:30_1: satta ariyapuggalavibhāgaṁ dassetuṁ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Dhammānusārī nāmāti ettha
anya-e0401n8:30_2: “dhammo”ti paññā vuccati ‘saccaṁ, dhammo, dhīti, cāgo,ti ettha viya. Tikkhataraṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_3: dhammaṁ anussaratīti dhammānusārī. Paññābalānusārena ādimhi maggaṁ labhatīti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_4: hoti. Athavā. “Dhammo”ti nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena saṅkhāra dhammo vuccati. Suññatadassanañca
anya-e0401n8:30_5: nāma visesato suddhadhamma dassanaṁ nāma. Iti suddhadhammaṁ anussarati, ñāṇagatiyā
anya-e0401n8:30_6: anugacchatīti dhammānusārī. Diṭṭhipattoti ettha diṭṭhināma dassanaññāṇaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_7: Ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddha dassanasampannattā diṭṭhibaleneva sukhena taṁ taṁ maggaphalaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_8: pattoti diṭṭhipatto. Teneva dassana paññābalena kilesabandhanato vimuttoti paññāvimutto.
anya-e0401n8:30_9: Saṅkhāra dhammānaṁ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṁ aveccappasādo saddhā nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_10: Tattha “aveccappasādo”ti ñāṇasampayuttappasādo. “Ñāṇaṁ”ti ca saṅkhāra dhammānaṁ khaṇikabhāvanimittānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_11: dassanaññāṇaṁ. Tādise hi ñāṇe sati, tattha aveccappasādo nāma jāyati, no aññathāti.
anya-e0401n8:30_12: Saddhaṁ anussaratīti saddhānusārī. Saddhābaleneva ādimhi ariyamaggaṁ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_13: hoti. Saddhābalena vimuttoti saddhāvimutto. “Kāyasakkhi nāmā”ti ettha sakkhaṁti sandiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:30_14: Yaṁ sādhakantipi vuccati. Attano kāye eva laddhaṁ sakkhaṁ yassāti kāyasakkhī. Dukkhānu
anya-e0401n8:30_15: passī puggalo hi saṁvega bahulo hoti. Saṁvego ca padhāna vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṁ. Saṁviggo
anya-e0401n8:30_16: yoniso padahatīti hi vuttaṁ. Tasmā so saṁvegavasena bhāvanaṁ anuyuñjanto yaṁ yaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_17: purisathāmena pattabbaṁ hoti. Taṁ taṁ pāpuṇāti. Pāpuṇanto ca attano kāye eva sakkhaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_18: labhati. Sandiṭṭhaṁ jhānasukhaṁ vā maggaphalasukhaṁ vā labhatīti vuttaṁ hoti. “Ubhatobhāga
anya-e0401n8:30_19: vimutto”ti arūpajjhānehi rūpakāyato arahattamaggaphalehi nāmakāyatoti evaṁ ubhohi
anya-e0401n8:30_20: kāyabhāgehi vimutto. Ettha ca tayo ariyapuggalā paññādhiko ca saddhādhiko ca vīriyādhiko
anya-e0401n8:30_21: ca. Tattha dhammānusārī ca diṭṭhipatto ca paññāvimutto ca paññādhiko nāma. Saddhānusārī
anya-e0401n8:30_22: ca saddhāvimutto ca saddhādhiko nāma. Kāyasakkhī ca ubhatobhāgavimutto ca vīriyādhiko
anya-e0401n8:30_23: nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ayañca puggalavibhāganayo paṭisambhidāmagganayena vutto. Abhidhamme
anya-e0401n8:30_24: pana puggala paññattiyaṁ saddhāvimutto ca kāyasakkhī ca dvepuggalā sekkhesu eva vuttā.
anya-e0401n8:30_25: Arahattaṁ pattā pana ete dvepi paññāvimuttā evāti daṭṭhabbā. Ettha siyā, saṅkhāra
anya-e0401n8:30_26: dhammānaṁ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṁ aveccappasādo saddhā nāmāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:30_27: Kiṁ pana tādisena saddhāmattena sotāpatti maggaṁ pāpuṇātīti. Ettha amhehi vattabbaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_28: natthi. Bhagavatā eva vuttaṁ. Yathāha mahāvagge okkanta saṁyutte cakkhu bhikkhave
anya-e0401n8:30_29: aniccaṁ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī, yo evaṁ saddahati, evaṁ adhimuccati. Ayaṁ vuccati
anya-e0401n8:30_30: saddhānusārī. Okkanto ariyabhūmiṁ. Atikkanto puthujjanabhūmiṁ. So yenakammena apāyaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_31: duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ uppajjeyya. Na taṁ kammaṁ karotīti. Sotaṁ bhikkhave aniccaṁ. Vipariṇāmī
anya-e0401n8:30_32: aññathābhāvītiādinā dvādasāyatanāni vitthāre tabbāni. Tattha “vipariṇāmī”ti vipariṇāmo
anya-e0401n8:30_33: yassa atthīti vipariṇāmī. Vipariṇāmoti ca khaṇe khaṇe jīraṇatā bhijjanatā vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_35: dīpeti. Sā eva sotāpattiyaṅgesu buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme, saṅghe
anya-e0401n8:30_36: aveccappasādena samannāgatoti vuttā. Tattha ñāṇasampayuttasaddhā nāma cakkhādīnaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_37: aniccanimitta dassanaññāṇena sampayuttā okappanasaddhā. Aniccanimittañca nāma rūpaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_38: aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenātipade vuttanayena cakkhādinissayānaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ santati parivattanādikaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_39: vuccati. Tañhi passanto cakkhādīnaṁ aniccabhāve saddahati, adhimuccati. Tānipi khaṇe
anya-e0401n8:30_40: khaṇe ekantena bhijjati yevāti saddhādhimokkhaṁ saddhāvinicchayaṁ paṭilabhatīti attho.
anya-e0401n8:30_41: “Buddhe aveccappasādenā”ti ettha pana arahatā sammāsambuddhatādīnaṁ buddhaguṇādīnaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_42: dassanaññāṇena sampayutto pasādo aveccappasādo nāma. Ariyabhūmi nāma diṭṭhānusaya
anya-e0401n8:30_43: vicikicchānusayehi parisuddhā avatthābhūmi vuccati. Tehi sahitā avatthābhūmi puthujjanabhūmi
anya-e0401n8:30_44: nāma. Kathaṁ pana tassa puggalassa puthujjanabhūmiṁ atikkantatā ariyabhūmiṁ okkantatā
anya-e0401n8:30_45: ca viññāyatīti āha “so yenā”tiādiṁ. Yo attano jīvitahetupi kiñci kammapathapattaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_46: apāyagāmi kammaṁ na karoti. So ekantena puthujjanabhūmiṁ atikkanto, ariyabhūmiṁ okkantoti
anya-e0401n8:30_47: viññāyatīti vuttaṁ hoti. Idaṁ saddhānusārisuttaṁ. Aparaṁpi vuttaṁ cakkhu bhikkhave
anya-e0401n8:30_48: vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī. Yassa evaṁ mattaso nijjhānaṁ khamati. Ayaṁ vuccati dhammānusārī
anya-e0401n8:30_49: tiādi. Tattha “mattaso nijjhānaṁ khamatī”ti saddhānusārīviya saddahanamatte aṭṭhatvā
anya-e0401n8:30_50: cakkhādīnaṁ tādisaṁ aniccataṁ samanupassanto thokaṁ thokaṁ dassanaṁ labhatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:30_51: Evaṁsati, cakkhādīni tassa puggalassa nijjhānaṁ olokanaṁ mattaso khamanti nāma. Idaṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_52: dhammānusārisuttaṁ. Aparaṁpi vuttaṁ cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṁ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n8:30_53: Yo evaṁ pajānāti passati. Ayaṁ vuccati sotāpanno tiādi. Tattha “pajānāti passatī”ti
anya-e0401n8:30_54: dhammānusārīviya mattaso nijjhānakkhamamatte aṭṭhatvā paññāya pajānāti, ñāṇacakkhuno
anya-e0401n8:30_55: paccakkhato passatīti attho. Idaṁ diṭṭhipattādīnaṁ suttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:31_0: “Yathā sakaṁ phalaṁ”ti ettha sassa attano idaṁ sakaṁ. Yaṁ yaṁ sakaṁ yathāsakanti
anya-e0401n8:31_1: atthaṁ dasseti sotāpannassātiādinā. Phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṁ pana anulomajavanāni
anya-e0401n8:31_2: eva phalānaṁ āsannakāraṇāni, na maggajavanānīti āha “na maggāgamanavasenā”ti. “So”ti
anya-e0401n8:32_0: Aniccānupassanā kiccato animittā hoti. Sabhāvato sanimittāeva. Niccanimittasahitāeva.
anya-e0401n8:32_1: Yato sā esohamasmītiggahaṇaṁ labhati. Idaṁpi vipassanāñāṇaṁ aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0401n8:32_2: samanupassitabbā ca hotīti. Tattha ca abhidhammaṁ patvā sabhāvappadhānaṁ hoti, na
anya-e0401n8:32_3: kiccappadhānaṁ. Tasmā abhidhamma nayena vipassanā attano nimitta nāmaṁ maggassa dātuṁ
anya-e0401n8:32_4: na sakkoti. Ayaṁ aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo. Kilesa dhammā nāma yassa uppajjanti, taṁ
anya-e0401n8:32_5: puggalaṁ palibundhanti. Sambādhaṁ karonti. Tasmā palibodhakarānāma. Taṁ puggalaṁ
anya-e0401n8:32_6: niccanimitta subhanimitta sukhanimitta attanimittāni gāhenti. Tasmā nimittakarānāma.
anya-e0401n8:32_7: Taṁ puggalaṁ ārammaṇesu bhusaṁ nihitaṁ niviṭṭhaṁ karonti. Tasmā paṇidhikarānāma.
anya-e0401n8:32_8: Te ca maggaphalāni ārammaṇaṁ na karonti. Maggaphalehi ca sampayogaṁ na gacchanti.
anya-e0401n8:32_9: Evaṁ ārammaṇakaraṇā divasena maggaphalesu tesaṁ abhāvo. Abhāvattāeva ca tāni maggaphalāni
anya-e0401n8:32_10: attano dhammatāya tīṇināmāni labhantīti dassetuṁ “ārammaṇa karaṇavasenavā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_0: “Attadiṭṭhiyā uppannāya uppajjantī”ti idaṁ tāsaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ attadiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0401n8:33_1: avinābhāvaṁ dīpeti. Na pana attadiṭṭhiyā tāhi avinābhāvanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Vipaccantīti
anya-e0401n8:33_2: apāyesu vipaccanti. Apāyapaṭisandhiṁ janenti. Diṭṭhasaccānañca ariyapuggalānaṁ. Diṭṭhivicikicchāsampayuttā
anya-e0401n8:33_5: bhavehī”ti kriyāpavagge karaṇavacanaṁ. Yathā sattahi māsehi vihāraṁ niṭṭhāpetīti.
anya-e0401n8:33_8: dhammo”ti virūpaṁ hutvā patanaṁ vinipāto. Apāyanipātoti vuttaṁ hoti. “Dhammo”ti sabhāvo.
anya-e0401n8:33_9: Natthi vinipāto dhammo yassāti viggaho. “Niyato”ti sugatibhavesu niyata gatiko. Sammā
anya-e0401n8:33_10: bujjhatīti sambodhi. Maggaññāṇaṁ. “Parāyanaṁ”ti parabhāge gantabbaṭṭhānaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:33_12: vuttaṁ hoti. Vā saddatthesu ca aniyamattho. Na vikappattho. Vikappatthehi sati dve
anya-e0401n8:33_13: eva sattakkhattuparamā labbhanti. Missakabhavona labbhati. Aniyamatthe tayopi labbhanti.
anya-e0401n8:33_14: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana samuccayatthassa gahitattā eko missakabhavo eva labbhati. Nanu
anya-e0401n8:33_15: ca saddo nāma samuccayatthe pākaṭo, na aniyamatthe. Tasmā samuccayatthova idha yuttoti
anya-e0401n8:33_16: ce. Na yutto. Kasmā. Dvinnaṁ asaṅgahitattā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana samuccayatthaṁ gahetvā
anya-e0401n8:33_17: te dve puggalā imasmiṁ pāṭhe asaṅgahitāti vuttaṁ. Yadi te imasmiṁ pāṭhe asaṅgahitā.
anya-e0401n8:33_18: Katthate saṅgahitā bhaveyyuṁ. Na hi koci sattakkhattu paramo nāma idha asaṅgahitoti
anya-e0401n8:33_19: yuttoti. “Assā”ti tassapāḷipāṭhassa. “Ettha ca yasmā. La. Paramo nāma vutto”ti idaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_20: upari ‘ye kāmabhave yevā’tiādinā ‘yediṭṭha dhamme vā’tiādinā ca yojetabbaṁ. So ca
anya-e0401n8:33_21: sukkhavipassako vā parihīnajjhāno vā daṭṭhabboti sambandho. “Pāḷiyaṁ”ti puggalapaññatti
anya-e0401n8:33_22: pāḷiyaṁ. “Idha niṭṭhā”ti imasmiṁ kāmaloke āsavakkhayaṁ patvā khandhaparinibbānapatti
anya-e0401n8:33_23: vasena niṭṭhā. Niṭṭhānaṁ pariyosānanti attho. Kulato kulaṁ gacchatīti kolaṁkolo.
anya-e0401n8:33_24: Bhavato bhavaṁ gacchatīti attho. Ekameva paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṁ bhavabījaṁ assa atthīti
anya-e0401n8:33_25: ekabījī. Yo ca diṭṭheva dhamme arahā. Tassa ca idha niṭṭhāti yojanā. Kena pana tiṇṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_26: sotāpannānaṁ viseso katoti. Sattakkhattu paramo tāva kevalaṁ pathamamagga sampayuttehi
anya-e0401n8:33_27: indriyehi kato. Itare dve uparimaggatthāya pavattitehi vipassanindriyehi katoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_28: Tattha sattakkhattu paramo sabbamuduko hoti. Tato kolaṁkolo tikkho. So pana cha bhaviko,
anya-e0401n8:33_29: pañcabhaviko, catubhaviko, tibhaviko, dvibhavikoti pañcavidho. Tattha pañcabhaviko
anya-e0401n8:33_30: tikkho. Sesā anukkamena tikkhatarāti daṭṭhabbā. Ekabījī pana ekabhaviko sabbatikkho.
anya-e0401n8:33_31: Tattha sattakkhattu paramo kevalena pathamamaggānubhāvena siddhattā sabbamuduko hoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_32: Itare dvepakatiyā sattakkhattu paramabhāve ṭhatvā uparimaggatthāya vipassanā kammaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_33: paṭṭhapenti. Tadā tesaṁ indriyāni puna visesa pattāni honti, tikkhāni. Tasmā te sattakkhattu
anya-e0401n8:33_34: paramato tikkhānāma hontīti. “Sattavārato oraṁ vā”ti idaṁ kolaṁkola ekabījino sandhāya
anya-e0401n8:33_35: vuttaṁ. “Upari tiṇṇaṁ maggānaṁ vipassanā niyāmetī”ti idaṁ uparime dvesotāpanne sandhāya
anya-e0401n8:33_36: vuttaṁ. Sattakkhattu paramopana pathamamaggeneva niyamitoti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tathāhi soyeva
anya-e0401n8:33_37: saṅgahapāṭhe sarūpato āgato sotāpatti maggaṁ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano
anya-e0401n8:33_38: sattakkhattu paramo sotāpanno nāma hotīti. Itare pana dve pāḷiyaṁ sotāpanna puggalavibhāgaṭṭhānesveva
anya-e0401n8:33_39: āgatāti. “Ye panā”ti ye sotāpanna puggalāpana. Gāthāyaṁ “itosattā”ti imasmiṁ manussaloke
anya-e0401n8:33_40: satta saṁsarāni. “Tatosattā”ti tasmiṁ devaloke sattāti attho. Aṅguttarapāṭhe “tenacittappasādenā”ti
anya-e0401n8:33_41: mahāsahassilokadhātuṁ sarena viññāpetuṁ samatthassa satthuguṇe cittappasādo jāyati.
anya-e0401n8:33_42: Tena cittappasādena. “Tena pariyāyenā”ti sace so devesu eva saṁsarati. Sattakkhattuṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_43: opapātika paṭisandhiyo gaṇhitvā tattheva parinibbāyissati. Yadi manussesu eva saṁsarati.
anya-e0401n8:33_44: Sattagabbhaseyyaka paṭisandhiyo gaṇhitvā ettheva parinibbāyissati. Evaṁ desanā vārena
anya-e0401n8:33_45: cuddasa katvā desitena pariyāyenāti attho. “Taṁ vīmaṁsitabbaṁ”ti vadantena ṭīkācariyena
anya-e0401n8:33_46: sayaṁ cuddasapaṭisandhiyova icchatīti dīpeti. Idāni taṁ cuddasapaṭisandhivādaṁ paṭikkhipanto
anya-e0401n8:33_48: aṭṭhānaṁ. “Ṭhānaṁ”ti mūlakāraṇaṁ. Natthi avakāso assāti anavakāso. “Avakāso”ti paccayakāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_49: “Yaṁ”ti kriyāparāmasanaṁ. Yaṁ nibbatteyya, taṁ nibbattanaṁ aṭṭhānaṁ. So nibbattana
anya-e0401n8:33_50: dhammo anavakāsoti yojanā. “Abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassā”ti sattabhavato uddhaṁ kāmabhave
anya-e0401n8:33_51: paṭisandhijanakassa kusalā kusalakamma viññāṇassa. “Nirodhenā”ti sotāpatti maggakkhaṇe
anya-e0401n8:33_52: eva nirodhanena. Nirujjhantīti sambandho. “Nāmañca rūpañcā”ti ye nāma rūpadhammā
anya-e0401n8:33_53: uppajjeyyuṁ. Ete nāma rūpadhammā ettha etasmiṁ abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇa nirodhakkhaṇe
