anya-e0401n8:33_55: “Tadekaṭṭhamohassā”ti tena rāgena tena dosena ekasmiṁ citte ekato ṭhitassa mohassa.
anya-e0401n8:33_56: Na diṭṭhivicikicchā sampayuttassa mohassa. Tassa pathamamagge eva pahīnattā. Nāpi
anya-e0401n8:33_57: uddhaccacittasampayuttassa mohassa. Tassa catutthamagge eva pahātabbattā. Uppajjantā
anya-e0401n8:33_58: rāgadosamohā. “Dhammikesū”ti dhammena samena uppannesu. “Yato”ti yaṁkāraṇā. Balavantakāraṇāti
anya-e0401n8:33_59: attho. “Tesaṁ”ti sotāpannānaṁ. “Sallikhana vasenā”ti bahalapakkhaṁ thūlabhāgaṁ suṭṭhulikhanavasena.
anya-e0401n8:33_60: Adhiccuppatti nāma pubbe yathāpavattaṁ kālaṁ adhicca atikkamma uppatti. Uppajjantānampi
anya-e0401n8:33_62: jāyampatīnaṁ methunakammasamāyogo nāma sakadāgāmīnaṁ atthīti icchito. Therohi adhiccuppattimattaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_63: icchati. Pariyuṭṭhānamandataṁ na icchati. Sakadāgāmīnaṁ puttadhītaropi sandissantīti
anya-e0401n8:33_64: vadati. “Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṁ paṭikkhitto”ti therassa manorathamattaṁti vatvā paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0401n8:33_65: Idaṁ sabbaṁ aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ vuttaṁ. “Chakkanipāte”ti aṅguttare chakkanipāte. “Migāsāḷavatthumhī”ti
anya-e0401n8:33_66: migāsāḷanāmikāya upāsikāya vatthumhi. Keci imaṁ vatthuṁ disvā mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_67: na rocenti. Mahāsivattheravādaṁ rocenti. “Abrahmacārino”ti methuna dhammā appaṭiviratassa.
anya-e0401n8:33_68: “Sakadāgāmittaṁ byākataṁ”ti tasmiṁ kālaṅkate so brāhmaṇo idha sakadāgāmibhāvaṁ patvā
anya-e0401n8:33_69: tusitākāyaṁ upapannoti evaṁ tassa yaṁ sakadāgāmittaṁ bhagavatā byākataṁ. “Adhigamavasenā”ti
anya-e0401n8:33_70: sakadāgāmibhāvaṁ paṭilābhavasena. Na pana abrahmacārino sato adhigamavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:33_71: Maraṇāsannakālepi hi sikkhāpadādhiṭṭhānena saha uparimaggaphalādhigamanaṁ nāma tikkhapaññassa
anya-e0401n8:33_72: ariyasāvakassa na dukkaranti. Etena kesañci theravādarocanaṁ paṭikkhittaṁ hoti. “Sakiṁdeva
anya-e0401n8:33_73: imaṁlokaṁ āgantvā”ti etena ito paralokaṁ gamanassa ca tato puna idhāgamanassa ca
anya-e0401n8:33_74: siddhattā ayaṁ puggalo suddhena magganiyāmena kāmabhave dvikkhattu paramonāma hotīti
anya-e0401n8:33_75: siddho. Kathaṁ. Idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyī, tattha patvā idha
anya-e0401n8:33_76: nibbattitvā tattha parinibbāyīti. Sesāpana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena siddhā hontīti
anya-e0401n8:33_77: viññāyati. Katame cattāro. Idha patvā idha parinibbāyī. Tattha patvā tattha parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n8:33_78: Idha patvā tattha parinibbāyī. Tattha patvā idha parinibbāyīti. Ettha ca tīsu sotāpannesu
anya-e0401n8:33_79: ekosattakkhattu paramo eva magganiyāmena siddho. Sesā pana dve sotāpannā vipassanāniyāmena
anya-e0401n8:33_80: siddhā. Cha sakadāgāmīsu dve eva magganiyāmena siddhā. Sesā pana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena
anya-e0401n8:33_81: siddhā. Tattha maggasiddhesu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu saṅkaro natthi. Vipassanāsiddhesu
anya-e0401n8:33_82: pana saṅkaro atthi. Atthato aviruddhe sati, vohāramattena saṅkare doso natthīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_83: Āgantvāti pāṭhavasena āgamanatoti vuttaṁ. Āgantāti pana pāṭho yutto. Āgamanasīlo
anya-e0401n8:33_84: āgamana dhammo hutvā sakadāgāmī nāmāti attho. Anāgantvā itthattanti etthapi esevanayo.
anya-e0401n8:33_85: Arahato bhāvo arahattaṁ. Arahatta maggaṁ. Dakkhiṇāya vipattikarānāma appapphala appānisaṁsakarā.
anya-e0401n8:33_86: Sampattikarā nāma mahapphala mahānisaṁsakarā. Sīlakkhandhādiguṇā nāma sīlakkhandha
anya-e0401n8:33_88: dakkhiṇāraha puggalesu. “Dhuraṁ”ti padhānasīsaṭṭhāniyaṁ vuccati. Saddhā eva dhuraṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_89: assāti saddhādhuro. Evaṁ paññādhuro. Kasmā panettha vīriyadhuro na gahitoti. Pāḷiyaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_90: saddhāvāhī maggaṁ bhāveti, paññāvāhī maggaṁ bhāvetīti vuttaṁ. Na pana vuttaṁ vīriyavāhī
anya-e0401n8:33_91: maggaṁ bhāvetīti. Tasmā na gahitoti. Kasmā pana vīriyavāhī maggaṁ bhāvetīti na vuttanti.
anya-e0401n8:33_92: Vuccate. Maggaṁ bhāventassa nāma ādimhi diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ pahānāya kammaṁ mahantaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_93: hoti. Kasmā, apāyamūlakattā. Tattha saddhā ca vicikicchā ca dve ujuppaṭipakkhā honti.
anya-e0401n8:33_94: Yasmiṁ ārammaṇe saddhā nivisati, tasmiṁ vicikicchā natthi. Yasmiṁ vicikicchā nivisati,
anya-e0401n8:33_95: tasmiṁ saddhā natthi. Tathā paññādiṭṭhiyo ca ujuppaṭipakkhā. Yattha paññā, na tattha
anya-e0401n8:33_96: diṭṭhi. Yattha diṭṭhi, na tattha paññāti. Api ca saddhā attano visaye diṭṭhiṁ vidhamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:33_97: Paññāya vicikicchāvidhamane vattabbameva natthi. Tasmā āraddha vipassako aniccādīsu
anya-e0401n8:33_99: pasīditvā saddhāvimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti. Paññāya aniccādīni nijjhānakkhamaṁ katvā
anya-e0401n8:33_100: dhammānusāribhāvañca suṭṭhutaraṁ passitvā diṭṭhipattapaññā vimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_101: Vīriyaṁ pana diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ paṭipakkhamattampi na hoti. Atha kho tāsaṁ sahāyopi
anya-e0401n8:33_102: hoti, dhurabhūtañca. Paggahalakkhaṇañhi vīriyaṁ. Taṁ saddhaṁpi paggaṇhāti, paññaṁpi
anya-e0401n8:33_103: paggaṇhāti, diṭṭhiṁpi paggaṇhāti, vicikicchampi paggaṇhātiyeva. Kutopana attano sabhāvena
anya-e0401n8:33_104: diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahituṁ sakkhissati. Tasmā imasmiṁ ṭhāne vīriyavāhīti ca vīriyadhuroti
anya-e0401n8:33_105: ca na vuttoti. Kāyasakkhimhi pana saddhā ca paññā ca samabalā honti. Vīriyañca sayaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_106: sammappadhānaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tadubhayaṁ upabrūheti. So ca puggalo tadubhayabalena diṭṭhivicikicchādayo
anya-e0401n8:33_107: pajahitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṁ pāpuṇāti. Aṭṭhavimokkhe vā uppādetvā ubhatobhāga vimuttabhāvaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_108: pāpuṇāti. Imesu pana dvīsu puggalesu vīriyassa thāmo suṭṭhu pākaṭo. Tasmā ime dve
anya-e0401n8:33_109: vīriyādhikātveva vattabbā. Na vīriyadhuroti. Catuppaṭipadā nāma dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
anya-e0401n8:33_110: Dukkhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā. Sukhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā. Sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā.
anya-e0401n8:33_111: Tividhavimokkho nāma suññato vimokkho. Animitto vimokkho. Appaṇihito vimokkho. “Tayo
anya-e0401n8:33_112: antarā parinibbāyino”ti ettha āyukappassa pariyantaṁ apatvā antarā eva kilesaparinibbānapattā
anya-e0401n8:33_113: antarāparinibbāyī nāma. So tividho. Āyukappassa pathamabhāge parinibbāyī, dutīyabhāge,
anya-e0401n8:33_114: tatīyabhāgeti. Ime tayo antarā parinibbāyino nāma. Upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma āyukappa
anya-e0401n8:33_115: pariyante parinibbāyī. Uddhaṁ mukho vaṭṭasoto etassāti uddhaṁsoto. Akaniṭṭhaṁ avassaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_116: gamissatīti akaniṭṭhagāmī. Vipassanā kammaṁ sasaṅkhāraṁ sappayogaṁ katvā parinibbāyī
anya-e0401n8:33_117: sasaṅkhāra parinibbāyī. Saṅkhārarahitena sukhena vipassanā kammena parinibbāyī asaṅkhāra
anya-e0401n8:33_118: parinibbāyī. “Dvādasa sotāpannā”ti ekabījikā tayo. Te eva catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā
anya-e0401n8:33_119: dvādasa. Dvādasa sakadāgāmino pubbe vuttanayā eva.
anya-e0401n8:34_0: Ekaccānaṁ eva anāgāmi arahantānaṁ eva. “Ajjhositassā”ti adhiositassa. Mamevidanti
anya-e0401n8:34_1: niṭṭhānaṁ katvā ṭhapitassa. Gilitvā ṭhapitassāti vuttaṁ hoti. Bahalena thūlena kāmarāgena
anya-e0401n8:34_2: vimuttā bahalarāgavimuttā. Āruppesu ca tasso arūpasamāpattiyo eva atthi. Na catasso
anya-e0401n8:34_3: rūpasamāpattiyo. Tasmā tattha anupubbanirodho na labbhati. “Ādito paṭṭhāyā”ti aṭṭhasu
anya-e0401n8:34_4: samāpattīsu pathamajjhāna samāpattiādi. Tato paṭṭhāya. Anupubbanirodho nāma pathamajjhāne
anya-e0401n8:34_5: paṭighasaññānānattasaññānaṁ nirodho. Paṭighasaññā nāma pañcaviññāṇasaññā. Nānattasaññā
anya-e0401n8:34_6: nāma kasiṇa nimittato aññesu nānārammaṇesu pavattamanoviññāṇa saññā. Dutīyajjhāne
anya-e0401n8:34_7: vitakka vicārānaṁ nirodhotiādinā anupubba nirodho. “Tato pañcamajjhānaṁ”ti pañcakanayena
anya-e0401n8:34_8: vuttaṁ. Aṭṭhasamāpatti vacanaṁ pana catukkanayena vuttaṁ. Tadubhayaṁpi puggalānurūpaṁ
anya-e0401n8:34_9: labbhatiyeva. Yuganandhaṁ nāma dvandabandhanaṁ, samathavipassanānaṁ yuganandhanti
anya-e0401n8:34_10: viggaho. “Samāpajjana vuṭṭhāna vipassanāvasenā”ti ettha vasibhāvapattaṁ samāpajjanañca
anya-e0401n8:34_11: vuṭṭhānañca gahetabbaṁ. Attano sarīrā baddhesu parikkhāresu samāpattibaleneva antarāyābhāvato
anya-e0401n8:34_12: visuṁ adhiṭṭhātabba kiccaṁ natthīti vuttaṁ “attano sarīrābaddhe parikkhāre ṭhapetvā”ti.
anya-e0401n8:34_13: “Nānābaddhānī”ti nānāṭhānehi ābaddhāni. Nānāṭhānesu ṭhapitānīti vuttaṁ hoti. “Parissayenā”ti
anya-e0401n8:34_14: antarāyena. Māvinassantūti vā nānābaddha avikopanaṁ adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Tadā vuṭṭhahāmītivā
anya-e0401n8:34_16: attano jīvitakālassa upaparikkhaṇaṁ. Maraṇañhi nāma samāpattibalenapi paṭibāhituṁ
anya-e0401n8:34_17: na sakkāhoti. Anto samāpattiyañca maraṇe sati sabrahmacārīsu kattabbavattaṁ na kareyya.
anya-e0401n8:34_18: Etañhi vattaṁ yaṁ ariyasāvakānaṁ maraṇāsanne sabrahmacārīnaṁ vā upaṭṭhākānaṁ vā appamādakathānu
anya-e0401n8:34_19: sāsanikammaṁ. Samāpattiyaṁ vā aññatitthiyānaṁ garahā vivajjanatthaṁ. Evañhi te garaheyyuṁ.
anya-e0401n8:34_20: Gotamasāvakānaṁ nirodhasamāpatti nāma ekaṁ maraṇamukhaṁ. Yaṁ samāpajjanto asuko bhikkhu
anya-e0401n8:35_0: “Yadatthaṁ”ti paṭipatti rasassādatthaṁ. “Tadatthe”ti tasmiṁ atthe. Nirāmisa sukhaṁ
anya-e0401n8:35_1: nāma āmisarahita sukhaṁ. Duvidhañhi sukhaṁ sāmisasukhañca nirāmisasukhañca. Tattha
anya-e0401n8:35_2: ye loke iṭṭha kanta manāpiyā pañcakāmaguṇā nāma atthi. Te kilesehi āmasitabbattā
anya-e0401n8:35_3: āmisā nāma. Yañcasukhaṁ te āmise paṭicca uppajjati, taṁ sāmisasukhaṁ nāma. Yaṁ loke
anya-e0401n8:35_4: dibbaṁ sukhaṁ mānusakaṁ sukhanti mamāyanti. Yañca anubhavantaṁ mahājanaṁ sabbāni
anya-e0401n8:35_5: apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivārenti. Jhānasukha maggasukha phalasukha nibbānasukhaṁ
anya-e0401n8:35_6: pana nirāmisasukhaṁ nāma. Yaṁ nekkhammasukhanti ca pavivekasukhanti ca upasamasukhanti
anya-e0401n8:35_7: ca sambodhisukhanti ca vimuttisukhanti ca ariyasukhanti ca anavajjasukhanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:35_8: Yañca anubhavantaṁ ariyajanaṁ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivajjanti. “Assāditabbaṭṭhenā”ti
anya-e0401n8:35_9: kilesapalibodhehi vimuttattā vipula gambhīra santa paṇītarasattā ca ahosukhaṁ ahosukhanti
anya-e0401n8:38_1: āgatena ācārena. “Ñāti mitta dhana bhogasampattiyā”ti hetuatthe karaṇavacanaṁ. “Visāle”ti
anya-e0401n8:38_2: vipule. “Tenā”ti tassapadassa vibhatyanta dassanaṁ. “Saddhāyā”ti ratanattaye aveccappasādasaddhāvasena.
anya-e0401n8:38_5: dosehi parisuddhānañca. Naṁ naṁ janaṁ pātirakkhatīti nampo. Diṭṭhadiṭṭhesu mettāvihārīti
anya-e0401n8:38_6: vuttaṁ hoti. Āvhātabboti avhayo. Nāmaṁ. Nampo iti avhayo assāti nampavhayoti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n8:38_8: tassa padassa pariyāyadassanametaṁ. “Attano mandabuddhīnaṁ”ti paccakkhe dharamānānanti
anya-e0401n8:38_9: adhippāyo. Tenāha “pacchima janānaṁ vā”ti. Anukampanaṁ anukampo. Kathaṁ nu kho ime
anya-e0401n8:38_10: janā abhidhammatthesu sukhena ājāneyyunti evaṁ pavatto cittabyāpāro. Atthato anudayasaṅkhātā
anya-e0401n8:38_11: karuṇāyeva. Tenāha “anudayaṁ kāruññaṁ”ti. “Patthitaṁ”ti vā sādhuvatassa yaṁ thero
anya-e0401n8:38_12: evarūpaṁ pakaraṇaṁ kareyyāti evaṁ cirakālaṁ patthitaṁ āsiṁsitanti attho. “Khuddasikkhāṭīkāyaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n8:38_13: porāṇaṭīkaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Somavihārotveva paññāyittha tasmiṁ dīpeti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:38_14: Gāthāyaṁ “athā”ti tasmiṁkāle. “Etthā”ti etasmiṁ nagare. “Saddo”ti kasmā rājā evarūpaṁ
anya-e0401n8:38_15: maṅgalahatthiṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ adāsi. Netaṁ patirūpaṁ yaṁ raññā katanti evaṁ pavatto
anya-e0401n8:38_17: “Raṭṭhavaḍḍhane”ti raṭṭhaṁ vaḍḍhetīti raṭṭhavaḍḍhano. Hatthināgo. So hi lakkhaṇasampanno
anya-e0401n8:38_18: ājāniyo hoti. Yasmiṁ raṭṭhe taṁ abhimaṅgalaṁ karonti, tasmiṁ raṭṭhe devo sammā vassati,
anya-e0401n8:38_19: nānābhayupaddavā tasmiṁ nuppajjantīti lokasammato maṅgalahatthī hoti. Tena vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n8:38_21: Dhanīyanti mahājanehi daṭṭhuṁ patthīyantīti dhaññā. Mahiddhikā. Adhivasanti etthāti
anya-e0401n8:38_22: adhivāso. Dhaññānaṁ adhivāsoti samāso. Ajjhāvasiṁsu etthāti ajjhāvutthaṁ. Kittiguṇavasena
anya-e0401n8:38_23: udenti uggacchantīti uditā. Uditānaṁpi uditoti viggaho. Tenāha “nabhamajjhe”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:38_24: Sārajjanaṁ sārado. Vigato sārado yassāti visārado. Visāradassa bhāvo vesārajjaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:38_26: Taṁ ādi etissā paññāyāti pariyattivesārajjādi paññā. Pāpato lajjanasīlāti lajjinoti
anya-e0401n8:38_27: āha “pāpagarahino”ti. Pāpaṁ dhammaṁ garahantiādīnavaṁ kathayanti sīlenāti pāpagarahino.
anya-e0401n8:38_28: “Anussarantū”ti punappunaṁ sarantu. Visesena bhavanti vepullaṁ gacchantīti vibhavā.
anya-e0401n8:38_29: Puññāni ca tāni vibhavācāti puññavibhavā. Vipulapuññānīti dassetuṁ “vipulānaṁ”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n8:38_30: Anuttariya dhammā nāma dassanānuttariya savanānuttariyādayo. Loke bahūsu dassanesu
anya-e0401n8:38_31: ito uttaraṁ aññaṁ dassanaṁ nāma natthīti dassanānuttariyaṁ. Ratanattayadassanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:38_33: savanānuttariyaṁ nāma. Tesu ratanattayādīsu saddhā paṭilābho lābhānuttariyaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:38_34: Tesameva punappunaṁ saraṇaṁ anussatānuttariyaṁ nāma. Ratanattaye catūhi paccayehi
anya-e0401n8:38_35: vā vattappaṭivattakaraṇena vā paricaraṇaṁ pāricariyānuttariyaṁ nāma. Buddhapaññattāsu
anya-e0401n8:38_36: tīsu sikkhāsu samādāya sikkhanaṁ sikkhānuttariyaṁ nāma. Tādise paññāvadātaguṇasobhādike
anya-e0401n8:38_37: guṇe avassaṁ bhajanti pāpuṇantīti tādisaguṇabhāgino. “Bhavissāmā”ti bhavituṁ ussāhaṁ
anya-e0401n8:40_1: dvisaṅkhyāya. Ekañca dukañca suññañca aṭṭhacāti gaṇanakkamo. Sahassa dvisata aṭṭhasaṅkhāte
anya-e0401n8:40_2: sāketi attho. Esanayo parato “navapañca cammekamhī”ti padepi. Gāthāvaṇṇanāsu. Nagarati
anya-e0401n8:40_3: na cavatīti nagaraṁ. Thāvariyanti vuttaṁ hoti. “Rañjetī”ti rameti. Khemasubhikkhatādiguṇehi
anya-e0401n8:40_4: anāgate jane gamāpeti, āgate aññattha gantuṁ na detīti vuttaṁ hoti. Rohitamigā nāma
anya-e0401n8:40_5: suvaṇṇavaṇṇamigā. “Sāke”ti sākanāmena raññā puna saṅkhatattā imaṁ kaliyugaṁ sākanti
anya-e0401n8:40_6: vuccati. Yaṁ etarahi sākrarājantipi voharanti. Sākarājā ca nāma uttarāpathesu eko
anya-e0401n8:40_7: gandhārarājā. Yaṁ jeṭṭhakaṁ katvā bhinnaladdhikā vajjībhikkhū imaṁ dhamma vinayaṁ
anya-e0401n8:40_8: mahāsaṅghīkaṁ nāma saṅgahaṁ āropenti. So ca dhammavinayasaṅgaho uttarāpathesu vattati.
anya-e0401n8:40_9: Vesāliyaṁ yasatthera saṅgaho pana dakkhiṇāpathesūti. Cattāriyugāni nāma loke paññapenti
anya-e0401n8:40_10: satyayugaṁ, dvāparayugaṁ, tetrayugaṁ, kaliyuga,nti. Yuganti ca āyuparimāṇaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:40_11: Idānipana kaliyugaṁ vattati. Tena vuttaṁ “sāketi kaliyuge”ti. Pāpayugeti attho. “La
anya-e0401n8:40_12: tī”ti sālikkhettānaṁ sodhanaṭṭhānattā evaṁ mrammadesavohārena laddhanāmaṁ araññaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:40_13: Taṁ pana muṁrvānagarassa esanne pañcadhanusatike padese jātaṁ. “Vissute”ti visesena
anya-e0401n8:40_14: kittite. Sārañca asārañca vivecenti vicāretvā jānantisīlenāti sārāsāra vivekinoti vacanatthoti.
anya-e0401n8:42: 1. Paramatthadīpanī nāma, yena therena sā katā.
anya-e0401n8:43: Teneve sā katā hoti, ayaṁ tassānu dīpanī.
anya-e0401n8:45: Kāḷe navamiyaṁ divā, majjhanhike niṭṭhaṁ gatā.
